name: Xtra Milk Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sheer.Key Notes:Amber, Bergamot, White Musk.Fragrance Description:A universal musk, amplified. Keep your friends close and your scent closer. Smells like you. Feels like pure comfort..About the Bottle:DedCool has reimagined fragrance to be way more functional and unique to you. Nontoxic, vegan, genderless. Endless combinations come together to create a signature scent that really feels like you.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (Parfum), Borago Officinalis Extract, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Punica Granatum Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract (decolorized), Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Kelp) Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Fucus Vesiculosus Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Extract, Porphyra Yezoensis Extract, D-Alpha Tocopherol, Benzyl Benzoate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray as desired on skin and clothing...Recycling Instructions:.-PACT partnership.

reviews.review_title: Nose blind at first, and then a stan
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was initially anosmic to this, but I put it on the other day and just felt so warm and cozy. It has a bit of an oily scent sometimes, and thatu2019s all I could smell at first, and I figured I was just smelling the base and was nose blind to the main perfume. The second time I wore it, I got an u201coilu201d scent still, but it was more of a warming massage oil, and it smelled like being in a cozy spa at an expensive, trendy hotel. Itu2019s the strangest scent, and itu2019s at not a perfume in the classical sense, but it has an aura about it that undeniably improves the feeling of the world around it. If youu2019re into strong scents, this is probably not for you. Other things around me like trees and food smell better when Iu2019m wearing this. Thatu2019s something Iu2019ve noticed with u201cskin scents,u201d but this one in particular. Itu2019s also great for layering under things. Youu2019ll just smell warm and clean (but not in an aquatic or citrus way).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin

I smelled a faint musky scent for about one minute, then nothing.  I immediately sprayed two sprays of Angel's Share and smelled it as strong as can be.   This perfume is great if you want to spend $100 to not smell anything. Cool bottle, though.

This fragrance smells a little good, but it truly SUCKS. It does NOT last long at all and is not strong. AT ALL. I was disappointed that I spent $20 on this and I had to spray 8 or more sprays to at least smell a bit of it. Disappointed customer for sure.

reviews.review_text: Ugh such a tough one for me - this is a fragrance I bought immediately after getting the sample because it was one of the best things I had ever smelt. HOWEVER, it does not last :( I used it on my husband as well, thinking maybe I was just nose-blind to it on myself - but sure enough after like an hour I can't really smell it on him at all. Such a disappointment for a 90$ fragrance. If they could somehow fix the staying power, I would definitely repurchase because right after application it smells so amazing. I want to love it so bad.

reviews.review_title: I just want to drench myself in this perfume lol
reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells soooooo so so good and clean. This is definitely my signature fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have worn many, many fragrances throughout the years!!! I have never in my entire life found one as wonderful as this.  It has a lasting effect, itu2019s captivating and has people daily asking what I am wearing. It smells up the room. My dogs even love the smell as it seems to relax them and they lay with their head on my wrist where I have just sprayed it. It is relaxing, clean, non migraine triggering and gender neutral. I cannot even in words say in a review how wonderful this is only that I hope this company never stops making this perfume, and this scent. The only thing I wish to see is in the future it be available at least annually in larger sizes such as a 3.4 and even a 6.8. Holiday would be a wonderful time to release larger sizes. I also ask the company to never change the formula makeup of this as sometimes perfume companies can alter fragrance with time. This formula always needs to be available and in the same formula. I used to work in a store selling fragrance and have smelled hundreds of them. Nothing comes close to this. I wear it alone as it can also be used to later with other fragrances but I love it stand alone. Maybe in the future a body butter can also be created for layering purposes to help keep it on even longer than it already does to help with dry skin. Thank you to the creator of this best smelling fragrance!!! I will never wear anything else!!! I have a bottle at home and always have a travel spray with me. Iu2019m all glad the travel is a spray and not a roll on. The spray is much better. I love the construction of the bottle as well. There is literally nothing to be changed about this fragrance that in my opinion is the best that even exists except that a larger size needs to be available annually if not semi annually.

reviews.review_text: The scent has a relatively pleasant musky smell but doesn't linger. My boyfriend can't detect it at all, and after using it for a week, I've become nose blind to it and can't smell anything either. It kind of sucks.

reviews.review_title: Take my advice. This is a total waste of money.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the 6 sample box from the Dedcool company after hearing an influencer on YouTube rave about it. That cost $39.27 with tax and shipping. I chose u201cMilku201d and ordered the 1.7 fl oz bottle ($85.80). It was nothing like the sample and had no scent. After several back and forth emails, they sent me a prepaid label to mail them back the bottle. I was then sent a replacement bottle which also had no scent  and left an oily residue on Mr arm after more then 30 minutes to let it dry. Thatu2019s the second picture. I wasted $125.07 .
I love this fragrance! I finally found out what it smells like! It smells like an empty Play-Doe container!

reviews.review_title: Bottle did not smell at all like the sample : (
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased some testers from DedCool and fell in LOVE with XtraMilk! I had to own a full size right away and decided to purchase it at Sephora. I was soooo disappointed once I tried it on. It smells nothing like the tester that I received and truth be told it barely smells like anything at all. I see that they are quite a few similar experiences in the reviews. I don't know if the bottled version is a watered down version of the tester (I have come across this before : / ) or if there was some production issue but the smell and quality is NOT the same. I saw one person in the reviews respond to these negative reviews stating the perfume needs to age. Which if true is slightly annoying that they pass the aging period on to the customer. Either way I will give it 30 days (until the date I have to return). Hopefully the perfume develops with in the time if thatu2019s the case cause the XtraMilk scent that I smelled and fell in love with if AMAZING!

One answer:Maturation,When youu2019re smelling the perfume in store,itu2019s already been sprayed before,so itu2019s had time to brew almost like a fine wine,itu2019s had time to develope and the notes marinaded now when you get a brand new bottle thatu2019s never been sprayed it hasnu2019t got that chance to age , my best advice is to spray it a few times then let it sit for a week or so then revisit it, I promise you itu2019ll change <3 hope this helps some.

Personally, i cant smell it but Iu2019ve gotten SSOO many compliments it became my most complimented scent after just a few months of wearing it. If youu2019re noseblind to other molecular scents like Molecule 01, Nemat Amber, and JHAG NAT, chances are youu2019ll be noseblind to this too. Itu2019s pretty oily so spray far enough away from shirts so you donu2019t stain them (Iu2019ve learned that the hard way) or in your hair. On clothes it seems to last awhile as I work 12 hour shifts and still have gotten compliments after. For someone looking or a simple, everyday, every occasion, non offensive fragrance, I cant recommend this enough!! PLEASE donu2019t ever change anything about this scent, Dedcool ud83dude29

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk is a game-changer in the realm of fragrance. Its unique blend of creamy, comforting notes creates an olfactory experience unlike any other. From the moment you apply it, you're enveloped in a warm embrace of rich milk, vanilla, and coconut, transporting you to a cozy, indulgent sanctuary. The scent is beautifully balanced, not overwhelming but present enough to linger throughout the day, leaving a trail of soft, inviting fragrance wherever you go. What sets DedCool Xtra Milk apart is its versatilityu2014it's perfect for any occasion, whether you're lounging at home or stepping out for a night on the town. Plus, knowing that it's cruelty-free and vegan adds an extra layer of appeal. If you're seeking a fragrance that's both comforting and captivating, look no further than DedCool Xtra Milk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Xtra Milk layer spray is a staple in my household. Itu2019s delightful and warm. I love how itu2019s all natural and that they have high quality safety standards. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: Fresh and clean and skin like
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who is sensitive to fragrance and has tried sooo many, I really enjoy this scent and the experience it provides. First, the bottle is so clean and cool and minimal-itu2019s so aesthetic looking on my dresser. It feels luxe which is important to me when Iu2019m spending a lot on a fragrance. The barcode is cool, too. The scent name is milk, but to me it doesnu2019t smell milky. It smells clean and fresh and like skin but elevated. It gives me the feeling of brand new-like Iu2019m starting a new chapter, got a new outfit on, meeting someone new-crisp and exciting. It is energizing and makes me feel ready to take on new challenges and like my scent will match! I love the longevity as well-it lasted all day on my skin and my clothes. I also love the brand story!

reviews.review_title: A truly Unique,  absolutely cozy, perfect scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lover of all things beauty, but perfume is my absolute favorite thing to review. I had no expectations with this fragrance, except seeing the word musk. I am not usually a fan of a musk base, but this is not a usual fragrance. This fragrance evoked an absolutely pure essence of billowing amber clouds, wrapping me in the warmth and eloquence of that moment between moments, where you hold your breath, and then...warmly exhale. This gives me the feeling of being clean and safe, while feeling beautiful at the same time. The packaging is very willful in its intent to say,  I've been assigned to your chemistry, do with me what you will. The simple bar code and dome shaped bottle with overly simplified letters and a silver cap says just that, I believe leaves it open for individual personal pheromones and individual separate fragrance layering, (or not,) to work very uniquely with this fragrance; and it absolutely does. I occasionally get compliments on my other scents, but within the first day of wearing this, I was told 4 times that I smelled amazing, and was urged to tell them what I was wearing. And of course I did not shy away from that! This fragrance is unlike any I have smelled or worn before, and it is soft, cozy and wonderful. You can layer it, as it's intended for, or on its own which is how I personally prefer it. I absolutely recommend at least going to Sephora and testing it for yourself and on yourself, so you can experience its amazing layering abilities, or, wear it on its own and fall head over heels with it and it on yourself! I am in love in a very quiet and lovely way with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfume! Being in the beauty industry for 10 years now I have tried quite a few brands of perfume. I tend to be pretty sensitive to strong scents. This perfume seems to be more of a mild fragrance and has a almost tame musky spicy scent. I noticed that this does last all day even with having spritzed it on my wrist and washing my hands constantly throughout the day it seems to of lasted. I can't wait to try other scents in this line. This is my newest obsession and will be buying every product in this milk scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk Eau de Parfum is an absolute delight for the senses! As a natural beauty enthusiast, I was drawn to its clean and sustainable ethos, and it exceeded my expectations. The scent is a dreamy blend of creamy coconut milk, warm vanilla, and subtle hints of sandalwood, creating a comforting and luxurious olfactory experience. What sets it apart is its longevity u2013 one spritz in the morning lasts me all day, evolving beautifully with my body chemistry. The minimalist packaging is chic and eco-friendly, reflecting the brand's commitment to sustainability. I appreciate that it's vegan and cruelty-free, aligning perfectly with my values. Whether I'm running errands or attending a special event, Xtra Milk adds a touch of sophistication and warmth to my day. It's become my signature scent, drawing compliments wherever I go. If you're searching for a unique and long-lasting fragrance that's both eco-conscious and luxurious, DedCool Xtra Milk is an absolute must-have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried DedCool Xtra Milk Fragrance, I knew it would become a staple in my fragrance collection. The universal musk scent smells clean and fresh, yet comforting and warmu2014 can I give 6 Stars?!?  The scent is described as amplified musk and it truly delivers. It's warm and comforting like the smell of fresh laundry, but richer and more complex. The notes blend together seamlessly for an aromatic yet sophisticated scent that draws you in.  The fragrance itself is subtle but impactful. The milky musk notes seem to proje t a scent that feels uniquely my own n the most flattering way. It layers beautifully with other fragrances to create custom blends. I love pairing with other Dedcool fragrnaces because they work sooooo well together!  DedCool Xtra Milk Fragrance instantly makes me feel more put together and confident, like I've just had a spa day. The comforting aroma lingers in a pleasant way, allowing me to enjoy the scent all day long. I find myself reaching for this fragrance daily and recommend it to all my friends. After dog sitting my friend asked if I gave her dog a bath because she smelled so good. I said, nope, thats DedCool!  If you want an easy-to-wear fragrance that feels luxurious and comforting, makes smart use of product, and allows you to build custom scent profiles, I highly recommend giving DedCool Xtra Milk Fragrance a try. It has quickly become my new favorite, go-to fragrance that I know I'll be using for a long time to come.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this vegan and genderless Extra Milk fragrance from DEDCOOL. Itu2019s one fragrance that doesnu2019t give me a WOW factor on the first initial spray. I feel like Iu2019m playing a kind of hide and seek game to figure out what this scent is about, and whatu2019s included in this unique formula.   I love the soft and subtle, and itu2019s not too heavy on the nose! Itu2019s pleasant and not too strong with a clean odor.  It is kind of rustic and reminds me of the outdoors. I do love and enjoy this Extra Milk fragrance after Iu2019ve been wearing it for a couple hours. I like the smooth, yet creamy and not too overpowering intensity of it. It is a scent Iu2019ve never experienced before so is quite exotic to me which is alluring. It has a warmth to it, not in temperature, but in feeling it gives me. Itu2019s a very clean and comforting scent with its refreshing bergamot hint, a nice touch of warm amber, and a semi sweet and powdery touch of white musk. I like that the fragrance doesnu2019t contain water! The oil tends to stay on for a lot longer. And the longer I wear it, the more I enjoy this very cozy and hearty scent of this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The description of Dedcoolu2019s Xtra Milk is spot on. It's an amplified musk with citrus notes in the opening that quickly develop into an interesting skin scentu2014familiar and comforting.   I randomly catch whiffs of the scent on me throughout the day, and it's a lovely surprise each time. I recommend checking the ingredients list, as it includes plenty of natural extracts in the formulation.  This scent is very unique among my fragrances and gives the impression that my natural scent is pleasant rather than being a perfumy product. I also use it for layering, and it amplifies my other perfumes.  The projection is a solid medium. It's a mysterious fragrance that appears and disappears throughout wear, rather than leaving a clear cloud or trail behind. It stays on my skin for 6+ hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool is a very cool perfume brand. This was my second perfume from the brand. I love the signature barcode on the front of the bottle. It is a universal scent so it can be layered and used by anyone. It uses bergamot, white musk, and amber. I can wear this scent daily. I spray it on my skin and on my clothing. I am a licensed cosmetologist. I love everything about beauty including fragrances. I was very happy to add this fragrance to my perfume collection. It is a clear bottle with a black spray nozzle. It is a large size and will last me a long time. The brand wants to reshape how fragrance is defined and I love their mission. I carry this with me in my purse and even my gym bag. It is a very comforting, familiar smell. I canu2019t wait to try more of their fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The name Xtra Milk makes you think it would smell of creamy vanilla.  Thatu2019s not Dedcoolu2019s Xtra Milk.  To boil what this fragrance smells of in the simplest terms, itu2019s a fresh, warm musky, citrusy scent.  You can wear it alone or layer with another of Deadcoolu2019s fragrances and the result is an explosion of notes that are uniquely you.

reviews.review_title: DedCool Xtra Milk Fresh and Sweet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second DedCool perfume I try out and wow the number one thing I have to say is the smell is long lasting for sure! The Xtra Milk scent is my favorite so far and it smells fresh and sweet at the same time. I sprayed just once in my arm to get a smell and that lasted me all day, I could smell it every time I lifted my arm to do something. I donu2019t know what they use in the ingredients that actually makes it long lasting, I think that has to be one of my favorite things about this brand. I am excited to try out the other scents but this is definitely my favorite so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an esthetician and I love trying new product so I have the best recommendations for my clients and friends. That includes fragrance! I love all of the DedCool  perfumes and Xtra milk is no different. First things first, every time I wear this perfume I always always always get compliments even at the end of the day. I am always surprised how people can still smell it on me hours after application. Itu2019s also amazing how little of this you need. Two sprays is all you need. The concentration is high. Even though I do try to apply perfumes to my clothes and not my skin when I do apply it to my skin, I have no irritation whatsoever. I would say to be careful when applying on your clothes because the product is a bit oily. Also a huge plus is how small the bottle is. I am able to pack it in my bag easily. At first it can be a little hard to smell yourself, but eventually you start too. It is a layering scent, but you can definitely use it by itself as well. Itu2019s smells warm and clean all at once, Iu2019ve never smelled anything like it.

reviews.review_title: It is smell so good ud83dude0d
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk is by far my favorite perfume. The scent not only lasts all day, but it remains just as beautiful as when I first applied it.   I've even noticed that the fragrance lingers on my clothes, making it an excellent choice for layering and wearing again the next day.   The fact that it's a unisex scent is a huge plus because not just me that love it ud83dude06 my partner is absolutely obsessed with this one, and the simplicity of the bottle design perfectly reflects the elegance of the fragrance itself, real simple and unique. Overall, DedCool Xtra Milk is a sophisticated, long-lasting, and versatile perfume that I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a truly unique and captivating scent.   Iu2019m sure it will last me for a long time but Iu2019ll absolutely repurchase it in the near future!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying DedCool's Xtra Milk Eau de Parfum, and I must say, it has become an instant favorite in my fragrance collection. This gender-neutral scent offers a unique olfactory journey that is both sophisticated and comforting.  The opening notes of Xtra Milk are an enticing blend of creamy and warm, creating a luscious and comforting initial impression. As the fragrance evolves, hints of vanilla and tonka bean emerge, adding a subtle sweetness that is not overpowering but rather delightful.  One of the standout features of this fragrance is its longevity. Xtra Milk has impressive staying power, lingering on the skin throughout the day without losing its allure. The dry-down reveals a velvety base of amber and musk, leaving a subtle and seductive trail that garners compliments.

reviews.review_title: One of the best layering scents
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a newbie to the fragrance space, it can be overwhelming to figure out what scents you like and don't like. At this point in my fragrance discovery journey, I have FELL head over heels for DEDCOOL. The Xtra Milk fragrance is beautiful.  It is not overpowering but rather delicate and understated. It has a hint of warm amber notes that linger throughout the day, leaving a pleasant and fresh scent. I particularly appreciate that it doesn't give me a headache like some other strong perfumes tend to do. I love that it is easy to layer and goes well with other scents in my fragrance collection. One of the attractions of this brand is that it has genderless scents so none of them lean too close to especially feminine or masculine Overall, I recommend this perfume to anyone who wants a subtle, yet sophisticated fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Reviewing fragrances is a particularly enticing part of my job as a professional beauty writer. By the time I was 12, I was wearing Guerlainu2019s Shalimar, and today I have more fragrances than shoes. Dedcoolu2019s Sunlit Blooms is a favorite of mine, and since XTRA Milk has amber as a base note, I thought it would be a good fit for me. Sadly, it is not.   The weird thing about this fragrance is that it disappears on my skin completely no matter where I spray it. I can tell where it was because it leaves a telltale sheen behind, but my nose canu2019t pick it up at all. I sprayed it on a tissue and was able to pick up a very slight hint of bergamot, but then it was gone again. I donu2019t know if this means that Iu2019m incapable of smelling white musk, or if the fragrance just doesnu2019t work with my chemistry. Iu2019m rating this one star, not because itu2019s bad, but because I simply canu2019t detect any of the notes even seconds after spraying it. 1 star

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for something that is light, clean, fresh, soft, and a little flirty, then this is it! This genderless and vegan Dedcool Extra Milk Eau De Parfum is a beautiful daytime or evening scent that is so very pleasant. Mix it with a touch of your other favorite fragrance after work or during cocktail hour for something a little sexier... and watch how many people ask you what you are wearing, like the day I went out for Valentines Day. Oh yes, this is a fragrance that can be layered!  As soon as it hits my skin, it comes alive, im attracted to my self! It radiates from my hot points and just keeps its scent all day without having to reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the concept of the Xtra Milk fragrance that works both as a base fragrance to be combined with other fragrances, but also on its own. I have never tried combining fragrances before but I am now absolutely sold on this idea. I tried this fragrance under some of my other favorites and it gave them a nice boost as well. This fragrance has mostly (if not all) bottom notes, which are usually not my favorite part of a fragrance. However, this scent is not overpowering and truly is genderless. I could definitely smell the Musk but the Bergamot and Amber scents also came through so it was a great balance. I actually ended up spraying my closet with this scent so I would be able to start the day with a pleasant scent already on my clothes. I also really like the packaging of this fragrance. The fact that it is completely colorless is different than most of my other fragrances so this one stands out on my shelf. I also think the sprayer gives the right amount of fragrance with only 1 spray. Overall great product from an innovative company.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have had my eyes on dedcool for a while and I finally got to try a fragrance from them. Dedcool Xtra Milk is the latest fragrance Iu2019ve tried and I truly feel like itu2019s going to be one of my signature scents. Itu2019s a little hard to describe but Iu2019ll do my best. Xtra Milk smells like fresh laundry without a floral finish.Itu2019s clean, sophisticated and super wearable. Iu2019m on the newer side of the fragrance world and I still donu2019t really know what notes I enjoy. Whatever is in Xtra milk, is the vibe I like!  I love how it stays on my clothing and leaves a subtle scent, the scent does change once itu2019s been worn for a while. I really like that Dedcool fragrances are genderless, they can definitely be used and enjoyed by anyone. If you like subtle scents that smell clean and unique I definitely recommend trying dedcool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So this perfume is not like any other perfume I have used. The Dedcool Xtra-Milk is a light, milky perfume. When you spray it onto your skin, you can see its almost opaque, white milky color. Hence, the name of the perfume has milk in it. My boyfriend described to me that it smalls like Strawberry Boba and says it smells so good. I think this perfume may smell different on everyone. My mom says she doesnu2019t like the smell on her, but I personally love it! As a beauty enthusiast, Iu2019ve tried many perfumes and this one takes the cake for uniqueness. Lots of other perfumes are strong but this one is nice, not too strong at all. I recommend this perfume to anyone, the cool thing about Dedcool is that the scents are genderless. It is a must have to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Upon first whiff, I'm going to be honest that I didn't really smell the milk layering in it which what I was looking forward to. Although I did smell the notes of bergamot, universal white musk, and amber. The scent did not disappoint! To me, it's a perfume that l've never smelled before but it somehow feels so familiar? This is one of those head-turner perfumes because the smell is something that's hard to forget. The projection is not the greatest but anyone within reach from me can smell it right away. I feel as if this could pass as a men's perfume. It definitely gives me that aura of being sexy and mysterious.

reviews.review_title: Dedcool Xtra Milk Eau de Perfum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m happy to announceu2026 DedCool has quickly climbed up my preference latter. I recently fell in love with the Sunlit Blooms scent, so I just knew I had to try a different one as well. I decided to go with the u201cXtra Milku201d. This option is genderless, smells amazing and is even layer-able which makes it very customizable.  Iu2019ve always been a fan of layering perfumes together. However, I never know which scents complement other scents. Deadpool so graciously helped eliminate any confusion with this option. I was successfully able to layer this fragrance with other Deadpool options, or underneath my personal favorites that arenu2019t Dedool.  Either way, this u201cXtra Milku201d enhanced the experience.   Thankfully I wasnu2019t left feeling over powered or with a headache due to a clash in fragrant notes. As a matter of fact, my hubby also loved it and now u201cwants to shareu201d. If that isnu2019t convinced, I donu2019t know what is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a perfume lover, mainly vanilla and caramel scents. This was very unique; and I loved how it smelled in the bottle. On my skin, not so much. I got compliments on it, but I personally wasnu2019t a fan of it on me. Itu2019s very pretty, and the atomizer works great. But Iu2019m sad that this didnu2019t meet my expectations with the fragrance notes. Iu2019ll use it, but itu2019s not my favorite.

As a perfume enthusiast for the past ten years, I have been scouring the perfume aisles in stores and subscription services online for a scent and perfume that I could use daily as a signature scent and I think I've finally found one. I love that it's unique and xtra milk scent actually does change depending on the person!! I've tried a product with a similar concept from a different brand but I have to say this one might be even better. I tested it both on myself and someone else and it was crazy that it actually smelled completely different. I don't know if it's because of it changes, but I think it does a great job of giving me a scent that is unique but subtle so I don't smell like I bathed in the floral aisle of sephora or a department store which I feel like sometimes I get especially when I want a more feminine scent. It's clean but still feminine while having a musk that gives it some depth which I personally favor and the design of the bottle seems very minimal and trendy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Xtra Milk eau de parfum by Dedcool is a fragrance that combines notes of bergamot, white musk, and amber to create a unique and captivating scent. Bergamot is known for its citrusy and refreshing aroma, while white musk adds a clean and subtle undertone to the fragrance. The addition of amber brings warmth and depth to the overall composition. The combination of these notes in the Xtra Milk results in a sophisticated and versatile scent that is suitable for both day and evening wear. The bergamot provides a fresh and invigorating opening, while the white musk adds a soft and comforting element. The amber base note lingers on my skin, leaving a lasting impression. Overall, Xtra Milk by Dedcool is a well-balanced and luxurious fragrance. Its blend of bergamot, white musk, and amber creates a harmonious and captivating scent that is perfect for those who appreciate quality and sophistication in their fragrances

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you so much for reading my review. I have over ten years in the beauty industry. I am a scent girlie for sure. Even if I am not leaving the house on a certain day, I will always have something spritzed on me. The scent is a very light musk scent. The scent would go well in the Fall or Winter, but is also light enough that it would go well in the Spring and Summer as well. I like the simple packaging and the fact that it comes in c a clear bottle so you know exactly how much product you have. I was told that this scent will last all day long. That the person wearing it might get used to it and not notice it anymore, but others will be able to smell it all day long. I tried this out. I sprayed it on at 12PM exactly. I got directly in my car, drove for an hour and asked my family if they could smell anything on me. They could not. I was highly disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ded Cool Xtra Milk is a vegan and genderless fragrance suitable for everyone. Its inclusive nature makes it accessible and appealing to a wide range of individuals. While wearing it, I noticed an interesting phenomenon: I couldn't detect the scent on myself after a short time, but others consistently complimented its pleasant aroma. The packaging is straightforward and minimalistic, reflecting the simplicity of the fragrance itself. Overall, Ded Cool Xtra Milk is a versatile and crowd-pleasing option for those seeking a fragrance that transcends gender boundaries and attracts positive attention from others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 30-year-old professional Makeup Artist, cosmetologist and skin care enthusiast I'm always trying out brands and new products to recommend to family, friends and clients. As a perfume lover, I was so excited to try out this perfume. I'm already in love with this brand, and what they stand for and how their products are made. This scent is such a unique scent that I don't think I would've normally grabbed. I'm actually obsessed with this scent and love the way it makes me smell through the whole day. This perfume last on your skin all day long and gives you such a light airy fresh smell. There's so many different notes in this perfume and it is so unique. I can't wait to recommend this to my brides for their big wedding day because it's such a special scent. I love that this perfume has such a warm clean, feel to it and I can't wait to wear it more often. The only negative thing I have to say about this perfume is my spray portion spray straight and not Misty so I don't know if I got a defective bottle or what but I would love for this to spray as a mist rather than straight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been experimenting with fragrance for over 10years. I have tried many kinds of perfumes from around the world. This one was a new brand/scent to me and I am excited to come across it. I sprayed it on and just let it sit and melt into my skin. This lasted me all day and could still smell it at night. Itu2019s a very fresh scent and is very nostalgic to me. On my skin I can smell Bergamot more than the other key notes. I have been using it as layering with other scents. The most amazing thing is that itu2019s genderless so It can be shared. I also love that itu2019s non toxic and vegan. The scent is very pleasant and amazing to wear around when you have to be around people with sensitive noses. Definitely smells rich/classy and so good I am obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been in the beauty industry for over seven years now, I absolutely love perfumes! I have tried so many and this is my first time trying this brand, and I was very impressed. First of all I love that the scent lasted a long time. I sprayed it in the morning at work on my jacket the next day when I brought my jacket to work it still had a light scent. I feel like most of the perfumes I own do not last as long as this one. I also love that it is not an overpowering scent. I received compliments on it. I love that is universal and that anyone can wear it. Itu2019s hard to describe the scent but itu2019s something that I have not smelled before. my favorite way to use. It is on my skin and a little bit over my clothes especially since I really enjoyed it. I do not want to waste it too quickly! I highly recommend it to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My time, including my experience within the beauty industry and community has humbly grown and transformed into a great fond career. My love for fragrances and scents has evolved drastically over the last years. My main obsession has been sweet yet subtle natural notes. The DedCool Xtra Milk is that clean girl scent that I have been on the hunt and search for! The bottle itself is very gorgeous and carries a massive amount, itu2019s perfect for layering or I even love wearing it on its own. The aroma of the scent is remarkable, I can best describe the lightly yet elegant natural notes as a soft sweet comfort musk. Iu2019m surprised with how long this perfume lasts on my body, I have been spritzing 2-4 sprays everyday so itu2019s safe to say I am actually obsessed! The gender neutral scent is beautiful for any and all occasion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DEBCOOL is my new favorite scent! It is beautiful, subtle and lasted all day. I love that xtra milk is gender neutral and smells good on everyone. By itself it is the perfect everyday scent especially if working on clients where you dont want your perfume over powering but this would add to the ambiance.  Having the the add ons is perfect and a good lesson on layering scents. This takes it from day time to date night. It gives you alittle something exyra for different moments. And the scents compliment the xtra milk so well. I personally love amber, musk, bergamot, jasmine and sandalwood.  I think this makes a great gift for someone because all scents are different and gives you such a variety.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lover of fragrances, smells and aromas so trying new fragrances is not new to me. I wear different fragrances based on my mood, clothes, destination or occasion. For me, fragrances make me feel empowered, special and sexy. If I ever need a pick me up spraying a perfume on makes me feel better.  DedCool Xtra Milk is a new take on a perfume. This perfume is genderless and really doesnu2019t have any notes that would classify it has male or female. This perfume is made in the United States. Dedcool is certified vegan, cruelty free (no animal testing or animal ingredients) are added to DedCool Xtra Milk.   I had a a mixed experience with DedCool Xtra Milk. I was very excited to try it and to smell all its notes. I really did love the notes of Amber, White Musk and Bergamot. I thought the scent itself is great, but my issue with the perfume was that I wanted it to last on me longer. The scent seemed to vanish within 10 minutes of applying it. I guess this perfume is meant to be reapplied often in order to continue the scent alive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I found this to be the perfect scent. Its definitely a light scent.  I work as a hair and Makeup artist. I definitely layer this is I am going out. Its rich and warm. It's got a little vanilla scent. I love that its light !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Over the past few years I have become infatuated by fragrances not just for the scent but the memories that come with it .Typically after the first spritz I can tell if Iu2019ll like a perfume or not and the minute I sprayed DedCooL Xtra Milk I immediately knew it was made for me! I felt like myself, warm and cozy. This is my go to everyday scent no matter the occasion. Itu2019s the perfect combination of warm and spicy but not over powering. The key notes bergamot, white musk, and amber are some of my favorite so it made sense why I enjoy it so much. With bergamot being the top note I feel like this makes it the perfect addition when layering scents. I really love that this fragrance is genderless and made for everyone including my fur babies they enjoy sniffing after Iu2019ve sprayed perfume and knowing this is safe and non toxic for them I gravitate towards DedCooL even more. This is my first waterless fragrance it does have a different feel to it compared to your average perfume itu2019s almost like a weightless body oil and even has its benefits . Depending on how much I apply this can linger for days itu2019s very subtle and seductive I absolutely love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance. From the bottle design to the name and how you can layer it with other perfumes it's extremely innovative and cool! ...hence the name. It truly does smell genderless, and it's the first genderless perfume I've tried. Another benefit to the genderless aspect of the perfume is it really goes with any outfit and vibe you're trying to achieve. I had my boyfriend and family members smell it and they all loved it. I also wore it out and got compliments- a telltale sign a product is great. ud83dude0c I love the story about the owner starting her own brand. It's very inspiring because I would love to have my own skincare line someday. You can tell that a lot of effort and passion went into this product. I can't wait to try all of the little perfumes in the discovery set as well!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an avid perfume collector and overall smell-good enthusiast, I come across a lot of great scents that complement other scents. Musky skin scents are one of the hardest types of fragrances to create that would make anybody smell good (in my opinion) because we all have different chemistry and reactions. I truly believe Dedcool absolutely broke the code with Xtra Milk because it is the cleanest, most sensual and unoffensive scent I've put up to my nose in literal years. I was so taken aback by how beautiful this fragrance is at first sniff, I screamed. It's a wear all the time, every time, everyday kind of scent for anybody. Xtra Milk has my nose in a chokehold, as well as my husband that typically likes very obviously masculine-leaning fragrances. I let him spray this once on himself and it went amazingly well with his chemistry as well. As an added bonus, Dedcool uses a waterless formula to get the best out of their scents and uses eco-friendly packaging! Everybody, please get this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far, I have been loving Dedcool fragrances and within every base of Dedcool products, they contain the u201cmilku201d. That being said, I was excited to try DedCool Xtra Milk because this is a stepped up version of their milk fragrance. Upon first sniff, all I could smell was milkiness, creamy, and woody type notes. This fragrance has notes of amber, bergamot, and white musk. The cool thing about this fragrance is that it becomes one with you so as it mixes with your body chemistryu2026you will smell something a little different. On the initial spray on the skin, it has a beautiful creamy feel with that soft muskiness. On the dry down, I get more of a smoky woody note that really shows up. I can absolutely say I am hooked with this fragrance. It sits so beautifully alone or layered with other fragrances. Personally, I absolutely love this scent alone. Once layered, it really amplifies the other fragrance. I really like it with a soft warm vanilla scent. It also layers well with a floral fragrance since it brings out some smokiness. Overall, I would totally recommend this as itu2019s one of my favorites. I noticed I keep reaching for it. Stellar product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Dedcool Xtra Milk perfume, and while I appreciate its warm and spicy fragrance, which is quite unique and distinct, I didnu2019t love it on me.  The combination of amber, bergamot, and white musk creates a comforting scent that works really well when layered with other perfumes as it doesnu2019t clash with feminine or masculine scents but adds an extra layer of warmth. Without layering, I found the scent to be a bit too sheer for my liking. While it's described as amplified, I didn't find it to be as long-lasting or intense as I had hoped and I stopped noticing it pretty quickly after applying.  Overall, I would give the Dedcool Xtra Milk perfume a rating of 3 out of 5 stars. It's a lovely scent with a warm and comforting feeling, but it lacks the longevity that I look for in a perfume and isnu2019t a scent that work well for me on itu2019s own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool has made its way into one of my favorite fragrance brands ever in such a short period of time. There is something about their fragrances that just blends so well with my chemistry and I get compliments every time I wear the scents. This one smells so elegant, yet cozy and warm. Itu2019s not an overwhelming fragrance either and it lasts all day on. I love to spray it even onto my clothing for a little extra comfort, if that makes sense. Itu2019s so beautiful and suitable for everyone! I think itu2019s great that they create fragrances that are unisex, making one bottle shareable on some occasions. Either way this perfume can really make you stand out in a crowd. I am definitely looking forward to trying out their other scents because I am obsessed with them so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really couldnu2019t put my finger on exactly what this perfume smells like, all I know is that I love it and I have been wearing it every day since I received it! If I had to describe it I would say itu2019s a mix of fresh laundry and clean skin with a musk undertone. This perfume is marketed as a unisex fragrance but to me it feels a bit more on the feminine side. It smells exactly what I would imagine the hot girl from an early 2000s romcom smells like. This fragrance can be worn alone or layered with other Dedcool fragrances. When I wear it alone, I love the smell for the first 15 minutes and then I can no longer smell it on myself. However everybody else can smell it on me throughout the day. When this perfume is layered it adds a unique fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Simply put, this fragrance is the just right scent that can hold its own when worn solo, while also doing double-duty as a beautiful layering option when worn in combination with many of my other perfumes. The packaging is no fuss and it sprays expertly and with ease. Iu2019ve experimented applying it in numerous ways and each time it delights. Thereu2019s a subtle warmth and sexiness evoked when I wear it - nothing overt, it just kind of creeps up in you and lingers. Iu2019ve layered it with other DedCool scents and a variety of other brands and either way itu2019s a win-win. As someone who collects and celebrates a wide range of fragrances, this bottle is a welcome addition to my collection and I find myself reaching for it time and again. The combos are endless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a stay-at-home mom to two boys and love trying new products for skincare, makeup, hair care and perfumes. This fragrance from Deadcool was my introduction to the brand and I liked it. It isnu2019t very strong but I can still catch the amber and bergamot notes in it. It was an interesting fragrance in the sense that it smelled different on me than on my husband. Since it is gender neutral, we were both able to try it and I liked that it worked with our individual body chemistry to get us our own individual scent. I have used it by itself but also tried it for layering with my other scents and quite liked it both ways. I liked the packaging as well. It is simple and classy. I also like that the fragrance is nontoxic, vegan, genderless and can be layered.

reviews.review_title: The smell is super super light
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfume lover here, I really love fragrances. Last year I bought like 9 perfumes (not including the colognes & body mists) just because I can't resist the temptation of beautiful and captivating smell. So, now is 2024 and have a chance to try this Dedcool Xtra Milk. It's actually my very first perfume this year though I didn't purchased it. Like I was super excited but the moment I tried to spray it on my wrists, back of my  ears and on inner part of my elbows, the excitement turns to disappointment because I can't really smell it. So, I just wait a little bit then spray it again and again and those parts became too oily because the perfume is an oil base. I didn't lose hope, I tried it again before bed coz I love to smelling good even at bedtime, so that my hubby can smell me. I have a dry skin so I put lotion first then spray the perfume but still can't smell it, the only time you can smell it when you spray it on your wrist then put your wrist on your nose, you can smell it very very very light, enough to say that it smells clean a little bit and that's it.. It's really hard to tell that it's smells like this and that because I really can't smell it, even my husband can't smell it on me. Tried layering it with my other perfume but still didn't work and on clothing, still nothing..This perfume is really not for me and for my liking but it doesn't mean it's not gonna work on you, everyone is different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk perfume is a true olfactory delight! It comes in a sleek clear glass bottle and black cap. Its creamy yet invigorating scent captivates your senses with top notes of bergamot, middle notes of white musk, and bottom notes of amber. The fragrance is genderless so really anyone can enjoy it. The fragrance is beautifully balanced, neither too heavy nor too light, making it perfect for any occasion. It can be worn on its own or layered with other complimenting scents. I love how it lingers on my skin throughout the day, evolving into a warm, comforting embrace. Xtra Milk is more than just a perfume; it's an experience that leaves me feeling confident, refreshed, and utterly indulged. DedCool has truly crafted a masterpiece with this fragrances!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk Eau de Parfum is a must-have fragrance for anyoneu2019s collection! This beautiful combination of amber, bergamot, and white musk is u201cyour skin but betteru201d - itu2019s a gentle, clean scent that feels comfortable, soft, and calm while still giving the perfect hint of animalic edge, and itu2019s perfectly genderless and universal.  This fragrance wears beautifully on its own, but also layers perfectly with nearly any fragrance and helps extend both the projection and longevity. On its own, Xtra Milk lasts all day on my skin and I definitely notice that it helps prolong the scent of some of my shorter-lasting fragrances. When used as a layering base, it does a fantastic job of deepening the intensity and complexity of the other fragrance without changing the scent.   I highly recommend Xtra Milk EDP as its own fragrance for those who love a good musky skin scent, and as a layering base for those who like their perfumes to last all day and project well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has been in the beauty world for 10 years Iu2019ve gotten the opportunity to try a variety of products. One of my favorites is fragrance. It is so personal and I feel is a way to express yourself so finding a signature scent(s) is so fun. Normally I am a floral fragrance girly but I do love warmer musk scents at times too. This one is definitely a new top favorite of mine. While it is a musk and has a warmer scent profile it still feels light and comforting. I love the minimalism of the bottle, it nicely and simply sits among my other fragrances. The only downside is I personally have found the top a little hard to remove but Iu2019m sure with continued use it will loosen itself more. Overall I really enjoy this fragrance and it has been my winter go to these past couple weeks. A great addition to anyoneu2019s fragrance arsenal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Being a content creator and enthusiast, Iu2019ve come across many products & brandsu2026DedCool being one of them. Although the brand has  been on my radar, Iu2019ve never tried them until now, a year later. What better way to indulge in the brand, than with Xtra Milk!   The Xtra Milk fragrance is like a tight warm hug from your favorite person. The notes (bergamot, white musk, & amber) on this just blends so perfectly together. Neither note over powers the next and thatu2019s what I love most. Xtra Milk is still a soft fragrance that will layer well and compliment other musk or amber fragrance's.   Not only does this fragrance feels great on the skin but the longevity on Xtra Milk is fantastic. DedCool did a fantastic job overall with the particular scent. This genderless, non toxic, vegan fragrance is a win in my book.

reviews.review_title: A Subtle and Genderless Option for Everyday Wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician, I'm always on the lookout for products that live up to their promises, especially when it comes to fragrances. DedCool Xtra Milk Perfume is a subtle and genderless option perfect for everyday wear. My experience with this perfume is a bit of a mixed bag. On the one hand, I appreciate its clean and refreshing scent. It reminds me of those spritzes you use to freshen up a room or your linens. It's great for a post-workout pick-me-up or a quick washup, but it's not exactly what I'd reach for when I want something super fancy for a special occasion.  The thing is, while the fragrance is nice, it tends to blend in with other scents rather easily. This makes it tricky to tell if you're smelling the perfume itself or something else you've got on. I found myself sniffing around trying to figure out where the scent was coming from, which made it a bit challenging to review. I'd categorize DedCool Xtra Milk Perfume more as a bath and body spray than a standalone perfume. It does the job okay, but it doesn't exactly knock my socks off. It lasts throughout the day, which is a plus, but you have to get up close to notice it.  So, in a nutshell, DedCool Xtra Milk Perfume is a versatile fragrance that's perfect for everyday use. It's easy to wear and suits all kinds of preferences, but if you're looking for something with a bit more oomph, you might want to keep searching.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this scent is a little difficult to describe because as someone who collects perfumes this one was very unexpected based on the notes, and the way it adapts differently to everyone, but oh my it was the most pleasant surprise for myself personally. First let's talk about the longevity, if you are one who loves for the scent to stay on their clothes for literal days, this is a winner. It's light, but also intoxicating. I find I will pick up the scent randomly throughout the day, for this reason I love spraying it in my hair because I'll get a nice surprise if I toss my hair around, or do a quick motion, etc. Now back to the scent, it's musky and ambery filled with the comfort and freshness of laundry day. It's nostalgic in a way and wraps you around into your own signature scent. On it's own it's incredible, but layered with Sunlit Blooms is my absolute favorite, warm, comforting, sunny, sweet. I have not been able to stop wearing it since I got it!

reviews.review_title: Great Perfume for any Gender and  stays long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first  trying Decool perfume And this is the first perfume scent I tried the Xtra Milk scent.  I like it very much .My expectations  were met and I'm impressed with my first  experience  and impression.   The scent and the  combination of the notes  are very appealing  and just smells great .  It's not too strong I got compliments  from my household  members  that it's smells that my perfume  smells great and I said thanks to Dedcool Xtra Milk perfume. I wore it for a week now and my experience were amazing .  I am truly happy with this perfume. I am seeing myself  wearing it everyday  in every  occasions  or casual  or even for everyday use.  I love that it lasts all day long and doesn't  mix with my sweat or Little  BO.  I am happy that it's made within  the country USA.  I like the idea of the company  about this perfume  that it is genderless ,that everyone could use it.  So my thought is that if anybody  wants a milky scent perfume that is not so strong and will last all day long then they should try this one.  I do recommend  this perfume  to anybody and I like the company's   overall  concept  I appreciate  it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very light genderless scent! It is very buildable with other products. I find myself using this daily because of the sweet milky smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019ve visited Las Vegas and walked through hotels on the strip, this fragrance reminds me of that moment in time. By walking through the hotels, you feel this unique scent that makes you feel more comfortable. The smell is welcoming and a scent for men and women of all ages to enjoy. The scent is clean and refreshing to complement a warm fuzzy feeling.   The scent is not overwhelming or too strong. I do not get headaches after applying this. Iu2019ve had several compliments when wearing this. People have asked me what perfume Iu2019m wearing. I love to tell them Dedcool extra milk. I love the name and it is easy to remember.   The glass bottle is a nice touch and feels classy. Donu2019t spray too close to your clothes or skin. No doubt, this fragrance is my new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the minimalistic packaging of the bottle. This scent is perfect for those who don't want something too strong but a subtle scent. I love this so much!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a newly released fragrance from Dedcool.  I enjoyed learning the brands motto and also experiencing this niche fragrance that is clean and also unisex.    The bottle is minimalistic designed, the spray itself didnu2019t mist as much but I enjoyed the fragrance.    This is more of a personal scent.  It has notes of bergamot and musk to my nose.  I think it will pair well with other fragrances as a base or a light personal scent depending on preference.  The projection is good and I wore it mainly during the day for fresh and light scent.  The spray lasted several hours before fading.    Overall i find that it is a very unique scent.  Itu2019s subtle and complex.  I enjoyed using it as my new favorite

reviews.review_title: May be this Parfume is for somebody, not for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician and working in the spa and beauty industry long time I want to share with you my professional opinion and personal experience about using genderless, nontoxic and vegan Fragrance Extra M M Milk Milk Milk

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When it comes to scents, I am very hard to please.  If it is the slightest bit offensive, I will right away pass on it.    The moment I tried this DedCool Xtra Milk scent, I was so impressed.  The scent is beautiful and alluring.  I am drawn to it more and more.  I can't stop smelling the scent. Definitely a keeper!  It has a very beautiful combination of musk, floral, warmth, depth, and sweetness.  I am so amazed at how beautiful all of these different scents came together and balanced each other like harmony.    It claims to be a genderless fragrance.  I obviously like the scent.  I wanted to test if the males in my family like the fragrance as well.  To my amazement, both my husband and my son liked the scent.  My son is picky.  He will right away show his opinion if he doesn't like something.  This scent was a winner.  My son loved smelling it over and over again.    I love the clear and transparent bottle.  I can see exactly what I am putting on my body, how much I have used, and when it is time to restock.  I would 100% recommend this.  Even if you are not a fragrance lover, you just might fall for this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love trying new scents for different seasons and I think I finally found my daytime spring scent. Dedcool xtra milk smells extremely delicious and invigorating. The scent is subtle yet unique and sophisticated. What I love about this scent is that itu2019s not too overpowering like other perfumes. It smells clean and fresh and warm.  As a mom-to-be, I love that the brand strives to make clean, non-toxic products. I feel totally confident spraying this scent directly onto my skin knowing that it wonu2019t cause me or my baby any harm.  My only critique is that the scent lasted about 5 hours for me. The longevity of the product is perfectly suitable for me but I know other individuals prefer scents that last longer. I found that if you layer this scent with other scents, it not only lasts longer (about 8 hours), but the combination of Dedcool xtra milk with other scents is absolute perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool the brand is vegan and nontoxic which is something I'm conscious about in recent years. I've developed sensitivity issues with fragrances so I can't use many of the products that l used to wear.   I appreciate the use of clean ingredients without compromising the quality of the fragrances.    Xtra Milk is a warm and spicy fragrance that's sheer- so it's rich in notes but not very heavy. The key notes are Amber, Bergamot and White Musk. This can be a sexy signature scent that's hard to pinpoint unless you own this and can recognize all the notes somehow. I don't tend to love musk because it reminds me of something my grandma wore - This is why you can't judge a fragrance by it's notes. This smells amazing! I love Amber and bergamot together, the musk made it more of a fresh warm and spicy scent on me.   This is a genderless fragrance, which I appreciate. My partner and I share his fragrances, maybe I can return the favor and make

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk is a great layering fragrance that can enhance your bodyu2019s natural scent or enhance any scented oil, body spray, or perfume. This productu2019s scent profile has a soft fresh undertone. I love that this product supports the concept of clean beauty. The aesthetic of the bottle and packaging is not only clean and uniform but the fragrance is vegan, cruelty-free, and made with natural, non-toxic ingredients. All and all very clean and classic! Perfect gift for young mail or women rather entrepreneur or corporate atmosphere! I work in the retail industry where my clients are of all ages and gender. I received many compliments from an assortment of clients of all ages, races, and lifestyles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: onstantly collecting new fragrances and always trying new smells so I was naturally so excited to try out the dedcool xtra milk. This fragrance was so light smelling and not over powering at all. I love that you can wear it by itself or layer it with another favorite fragrance I tried it both ways and really loved the outcome of the layering! This fragrance also last so long definitely out last all my other fragrances which I love about the brand and made me interested in trying other products from the brand. Xtra milk is also gender free fragrance which is pretty cool because my partner and I can both share it. I noticed it also smells different on me than it does on my partner and I love that. Overall this fragrance was super nice and light and smelt amazing mixed with my other perfumes and it came in such a unique bottle unlike any other fragrances Iu2019ve seen and I loved trying it and being able to get to know more about this brand and what it stands for.

reviews.review_title: What I wear when I want to get closer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra Milk by DeDCool I've always considered my self of a connoisseur of fragrance. So I typically experiment with different scents to see how they work with my chemistry. Well Xtra Milk by Dedcool is a Xtra universal scent, that I love amplified. It smells like me, fresh and clean after a relaxing shower. XTRA Milk is for me and everyone else to enjoy the aroma, that I'm basking in. I like the fact it's not overpowering but it is present, and demands everybody's attention. DedCool has worked its influence by this captivating scent XTRA Milk. This intensified version of the original MIlK has bergamot, white musk, and amber. Unlike the light and layerable Milk, XTRA Milk stands boldly on its own. The longevity is impressive, leaving a delightful trail without overwhelming the senses.  DedCoolu2019s XTRA Milk delivers intensity without giving you a migraine.ud83eudd29

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can definitely say that DedCoolu2019s packaging is cute, clean and simple. I like that it is not bright or in an odd shaped bottle. Xtra Milk is a underwhelming fragrance. I feel like on me it just smelled like a soap and not a fragrance. It is nice and smells clean, but it is not something Iu2019m just wowed by. It is strong enough that I could still smell it the next morning when I woke up. My husband said the smell of it almost reminds him of a disinfectant that would be used in a hospital. Unfortunately this didnu2019t work out, which was disappointing. I would recommend either trying this fragrance in the store to see which how it smells on you or get a travel size at first. Iu2019m sure this is a scent that smells better on certain people. I know this brand has other wonderful fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra Milk is heavenly! The first time I wore this out in public I got multiple compliments. I paired it with the Dedcool Fragrance Sunlit Blooms, but I like to wear it on its own or layer it with the Dedcool fragrance Taunt. It is amazing by itself or layered! The smell lasts all day even after I think it has faded away! Itu2019s a unique blend that is fresh, clean, warm & cozy. Everyone who passes by or hugs me always compliments my scent. I love the fact that is also non-toxic and a clean brand.  All DedCool fragrances are oil based, no water or alcohol added, so they are quickly absorbed into the skin and leave you smelling amazing literally all day long! Once the fragrance is on your skin, it mixes with your body chemistry so you have a scent that uniquely belongs to you. This is the perfect signature scent. It is not offensive or strong, it just smells lovely and clean. Even though it is a light scent, it has longevity.  My roommate will take a deep sniff when Iu2019m around and wearing the Xtra Milk. Her face will light up and with her eyes wide she will ask me if Iu2019m wearing milk. Itu2019s an interesting name but I donu2019t mind because I know I smell great. The last thing I would expect anyone to ask me is if I smell like milk, but it truly is a delicious scent. I highly recommend and will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect scent has arrived, the DedCool Xtra Milk. This scent has revolutionized my entire existence almost immediately. The soft lovely smell puts me in a happy mood the minute I sprayed it on. When I took it out of the box, I spun around and did a dance. The smell brings confidence and beauty over me. The glass bottle is simple but the bottle packs a punch with essence and style. The scent is best on the body but I do spray it on my sweater and even my jacket. I love that it goes on smooth and light but the smell hits you at different times in the day. I love that it is longwearing and long-lasting. I havenu2019t had this great smell and long-lasting smell in a long time. I havenu2019t invested much in a new fragrance but this is such a wonderful investment.

reviews.review_title: non offensive clean smell, but unremarkable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge perfume enthusiast, and love trying out new, unique scents, so I was very excited to test Xtra milk from Dedcool.  I love the fact it's vegan and genderless, it seems like a very creative brand that stands apart from other designers.   That said, I wasn't overly impressed with Xtra milk.  I tend towards fresh, citrus,  floral, amd gourmand fragrances, and this just didn't seem remarkable at all to me.   It smelled like fresh laundry, which was nice but something I could get from doing my laundry.  It has a thick, oily texture and is subtle, something you could wear to the office without offending any noses.  Maybe I'm anosmic to it but it just didn't really smell like anything.   These scents are designed to be layered and so it has a very simple profile.  It might be nice under a floral or citrus, or to brighten up a sweet perfume, but then it would probably just smell like floral, citrus, or vanilla freshly done laundry.   Not my thing, but not offensive.  I might use it to freshen up clothes on the way out the door to get a second wear out of them.  *** This review was created through an educational promotional event hosted between the brand and beauty experts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very much enjoyed using the Dedcool Xtra Milk parfum. I am an avid collector of fragrances. I am a 33-year-old guy and I have learned a lot about fragrances over the years. What I love, especially, about parfums is that they contain a higher concentration of oil and last much longer. I sprayed the Xtra Milk parfum on myself early in the morning and by the time I left work in the late afternoon I could still smell the fragrances on myself. This fragrance did exactly what I needed and expected a parfum to do - last the whole day without needing to be reapplied. The Xtra Milk parfum fragrance itself smelled amazing! It has a creamy, milky, and sweet smell that will work well for the fall and winter or even a night out anytime of the year. It gave me the feeling of being very luxurious.

reviews.review_title: Mild enough for my sensitive nose
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I worked for more than seven years in beauty retail, and yet I never got into fragrances as much as some others in the field. Partially because I have asthma, and a lot of scents can trigger it which is something I want to avoid. I was so happy to find a brand like Dedcool, where their fragrances are mild enough for me to handle! They are meant to layer, and make your own custom scent which I think is really cool. I also love that it is a line meant for all genders. But letu2019s get on to my thoughts about this one!    I have to say that the musk was definitely a top note. Itu2019s something that is way more evident to my nose than the other supporting notes. I also found this to be a warm and inviting fragrance that I kept wanting to go back and smell, just like the other ones Iu2019ve tried from Dedcool. Usually musk isnu2019t a scent I enjoy, but this was mild enough for me to do so. If youu2019re wondering the difference between Milk and Xtra Milk, I would say that the main difference is that the later is even stronger smelling. Even though it is stronger, it is still buildable, both by itself and in combination with other Dedcool scents. Just like other fragrances on the market, it is going to come down to personal taste whether this will be for you or not. I was a fan, because it was nice and mild and didnu2019t leave me with a headache or cough like some others on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This DedCool Xtra Milk is very cool. The scent has so many different shifting scents each time you smell it. I was very intrigued because I had never tried their regular milk scent but this is just enhanced. I am very pleased to say that it smells fantastic. It really is genderless and I enjoy that. Iu2019m pretty difficult when it comes to scents I donu2019t like anything too strong or too floral. I tend to drawl towards scents that are sweet and clean and subtle. I even enjoy male cologne more that womenu2019s perfume. But this Extra Milk is just that! Itu2019s clean and subtle yet has to me a semi cologne scent to it. The scent definitely shifts each time you spray it itu2019s honestly so unique. Wen I first tried DedCcol I was a little confused about the packaging but honestly after learning about it I love the simplicity of it and the box itself is fitting for this scent. I would definitely recommend giving this one a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re looking for a unique scent profile, and a fragrance that works with your personal pheromones, look no further and try this fragrance! I really loved trying the Xtra Milk EDP! It is truly genderless and the scent profile is super unique. Will recommend to everyone!

I find the scent of this perfume, among all of dedcool's scents, quite appealing. It strikes me as distinctly gender-neutral or even genderless, making it a fragrance that I can easily see my boyfriend using as well. Despite enjoying the scent, I find it challenging to pinpoint its exact nature. According to the brand's website, it's a blend of bergamot and white musk. The packaging of the perfume is charming, featuring a simple bottle with delicate etchingu2014making it, in my opinion, an adorable gift for someone. Despite my usual sensitivity to smells, this particular scent is pleasantly mild. Itu2019s not overpowering and doesnu2019t triggers headaches for me. Its neutral and subtle nature makes it suitable for everyday use. In my routine, a single spray of this perfume is ample, offering just the right amount of fragrance.

reviews.review_title: DedCool Xtra Milk Eau de Parfum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There is no better compliment than one about your scent. I love having all different kinds of parfumes and sprays for the different seasons. Xtra Milk by Dedcool is definitely one of the most unique parfume scents I have ever had the pleasure of trying. It is extremely light and very clean smelling. I was hoping to smell the deep notes of the amber, musk and bergamot just a little more. To be honest, after the first spritz I couldn't really smell too much. I tried spraying a little more especially in zones I knew I would be sure to smell it like the neck, behind the ears and of course my wrists. I always like to spray a bit of parfum right on the collar of clothes because usually that's where you will get the most wafts from a scent. I did notice throughout the afternoon I would catch the really nice light scents from the Xtra Milk. It's a wonderful scent when you catch it, but I just prefer my perfume to have a little more oomph to it.
