However, I feel like this scent can be used year round because it has that lightness to it yet that subtle hit of warm. Do note that while it is a nice scent it is extremely subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Normally I would develop headaches, runny nose and watery eyes from wearing perfumes. No symptoms with this brand. I sprayed the product directly on my skin. After 15 minutes the scent changed to sweeter scent after binding with my chemistry. The scent has a long wear. It never fades. I sprayed my jackets, went outside for errands, the scent is still there. No need to reapply. No need for over use of spraying. I had my boyfriend wear it for a day. After combining with his chemistry it gave off musk meets mahogany scent. He received several compliments. He sneaked a few wears without me knowing beause the sloution is lower. Dedcool is definitely my perfume. I wear it by itself and layer it with the milk and sunlit blooms for a sweeter scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying this genderless perfume that has completely shifted my olfactory experience. As someone who typically indulges in sweet floral scents, this fragrance brought a welcomed change with its clean, sharp aroma.  The initial spritz revealed a distinct scent that was modern and sophisticated. What stood out to me was the perfume's ability to cut through the sweetness of my usual choices, offering a refreshing contrast. I decided to test its longevity by spraying just one pump on the interior of the box, and to my surprise, even a week later, the scent remained as potent as ever.  The bottle itself is a work of art u2013 thick glass and crystal clear, it exudes a modern and clean aesthetic. The minimalist design aligns perfectly with the genderless theme, making it a versatile addition to any collection.  While this fragrance may not align with my typical preferences, I'm eager to incorporate it into my routine, especially on special occasions. It emanates a mature essence that feels fitting for those moments when you want to leave a lasting impression. The longevity of the scent also suggests that this bottle will be a lasting investment, ensuring it remains a staple in my fragrance collection for a considerable amount of time.  In conclusion, I'm pleasantly surprised and satisfied with this genderless perfume. It offers a departure from the ordinary, providing a clean and mature scent that complements rather than competes with my existing perfumes. I anticipate this bottle will become a cherished part of my routine, making it a wise and enduring choice for those seeking a unique and enduring fragrance experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The original scent has been my favorite for about two years but THE XTRA MILK IS DIVINE!! I LOVE the freshness of the bergamot and how clean and fun it smells. The wear on this stuff is CRAAAAZYYY! I put it on in the am one day and I wore a sweater but didn't spray it on the sweater the scent lasted till the next day on the inside of it but also on my skin until I took a shower the next morning! So safe to say it has a strong stay. I really love the spray, it's powerful and disperses very well. I would also like to point out that since it is potent spray farther away because it has the potential to leave some of the oils behind which actually was a HUGE bonus to me because I just rubbed it in and that was that. It doesn't leave a greasy residue or sticky feeling. Honestly, it feels like a lightweight perfume oil which is freaking amaaaazing to me. I love it and its bright, fresh, citrusy clean scent!!

reviews.review_title: A naturally light sweet scent that can be layered
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a beauty enthusiast who was looking for a perfume that suits me best. Everything I've found has been either too strong, not a good smelling scent in my opinion, or simply just not me. Then I found Xtra Milk. I absolutely love this scent and I feel like it enhances my natural aroma. This fragrance is warm, sweet, fresh, and very pleasing to the nose. I like how this perfume is suitable for either gender and I love how long it lasts, especially on clothes. Sometimes I layer this scent with other DedCool scents, which is great too! I absolutely love this perfume and it's fragrance is wonderful all on its own. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to try a natural perfume that can be layered or used on its own to enhance your natural sweet aroma. I will definitely keep using Xtra Milk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Xtra Milk is really catchy scent! I have the sunlit blooms scent already and love it so I was super eager to try the Xtra Milk. This fragrance really packs a punch that is very noticeable. I think it would be great for any gender. If anything it is a little on the masculine side but I am a female and love wearing it. I have received a lot of compliments on it as well. I think the part I love about this scent is it smells very clean and I donu2019t seem to notice any floral smells from it. It is long lasting and I only have to apply one spray of it and it lasts all day long. I would highly recommend the DedCool Xtra Milk to men and women of all ages. It is a nice fresh but catchy fragrance that will leave you smelling amazing all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a fragrance lover since I can remember. Xtra Milk is such a clean scent. It really reminds me of milk. It is lightly sweet. It is labeled as a genderless and vegan fragrance. The brand encourages us to layer our fragrances to make our own unique scent. This one is perfect for layering and is the perfect personal scent. If you donu2019t want an overpowering scent, this one is for you! I like to spritz it on in the morning after I get out of bed as it is gentle enough to wear anywhere I go! Then I layer on other fragrances throughout the day depending on my mood. It truly has the fresh clean scent like you experience when you just did laundry. The white musk really let me embrace this clean scent so I can see why it was labeled as genderless. The packaging itself is so edgy and cute! I love the barcode design and clear bottle. The barcode to me represents creating your unique code and scent once you layer the fragrance and make it your own. Iu2019ve never tried a fragrance like this, and I am in love with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love to have a good collection and variety in my fragrances. Dedcool is such a fun and innovative line- I love that they are unisex, clean and meant to be cocktailed.  What I love the most about this fragrance is how light it is on me, you can smell it and it turns a very pleasant sweet smell for me, but itu2019s not ever overwhelming.  I got lots of compliments on this fragrance when I wore it to work.  Itu2019s always best to a Spritz perfume straight onto skin vs clothing. I did notice this base has a lot of oil on it and will leave a slight oil behind on your skin but I didnu2019t notice it stain my clothing.  I definitely recommend this fragrance and brand for anyone itu2019s lovely and has so many fun options. Due to the musky nature of this scent it truly changes on everyone to your chemistry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk is a fragrance from DedCool, a Los Angeles-based fragrance brand. It has notes of bergamot, white musk, and amber. It is a genderless fragrance that is nontoxic and biodegradable. I like that DedCool Xtra Milk fragrance, with its creamy and comforting notes, can be versatile in its wearability. It is suitable for every day use, whether going for run, grocery shopping , cooler season, movie night and many more. Given its creamy and comforting nature, it may be particularly well-suited for cooler seasons like fall and winter. While it has a distinct presence, it's not overpowering, making it suitable for people who prefer subtle yet intriguing scents. I wore is at the dinner party and people complimented me. But it didn't lasted that long as I would have wished for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am someone who never wears the same fragrance two days in a row, so being able to try the Dedcool Xtra Milk fragrance was so exciting for me!  I have never tried a genderless fragrance before.  There's no particular reason for this but Dedcool has certainly opened my mind to this whole new world of fragrances.  The Xtra Milk fragrance is described as a musk.  This is not what I typically think of when it comes to musk fragrances, this is better.  I have typically avoided musk scents in the past because they tend to be heavy and what I think of as scents for the older generation.  The Xtra Milk is most definitely a smooth, light scent that lasts.  It's not fruity or floral.  It makes me think of sweet cotton.  It does change over the course of the day which is a neat feature.  I could see this being suitable for my husband as well as myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a stay at home mom who also works part time and am in my mid 30u2019s and I love trying out new beauty products. The smell of Dedcool xtra milk is tantalizing. I honestly love it and I think I may have found my new scent, I think itu2019s the Bergamot that really sets this scent apart. The scent is light but just perfect. My husband loves it too. It can be worn as a daily perfume and for any occasion. The one thing I did notice which I had heard is that you wonu2019t smell it anymore, I did find this true on the second day I wore it. I then took a break from it for a day and then I was able to smell it again. Having 3 kids with two under 5 makes me constantly have to worry about what I leave around the house, so when I found out Dedcool was nontoxic it was such a sigh of relief. I definitely recommend this perfume to anyone looking to find their scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oh, this smells so good!! This being vegan and toxic free makes it that much better. I have a lot of perfumes and honestly am getting bored of popular scents all smelling the same...this truly smelle unique and different. I lean more favorable to vanilla/sweet/gourmand type scents, but they usually smell heavy. This smells light clean and airy while still being sweet. It smells really good directly on my skin and when smelling from the bottle. When sprayed on clothing, it's less intense, but it still smells good - so I know it's not just my pH causing it to smell good.  It smells like a warm, inviting, clean home.  I find it more in the feminine side due to sweetness, but it can definitely be made more masculine.  The longevity lasts all day! I really like that I still smell it on myself after a work day. I have gotten many compliments and even told by my coworker that they still smelled it on me after seeing me later in the day.

reviews.review_title: This fragrance is a must have, great for layering
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool' s Xtra Milk is a gorgeous scent of Bergamot, White musk and Amber. I love all of these scents so this is right up my alley. It's a your scent but better fragrance. I feel it smells different on everyone and is excellent for layering. I've gotten into fragrances heavily in the last 5 years and right now this is one of my daily grabs. It's vegan, nontoxic and waterless. It lasts all day on me but I think it's different with everyone depending on how much you sweat and other things. The bottle is glass and 100% recyclable. The bottle is so cool and just has the brand name, scent name and a barcode. It's definitely eye catching. I love how this smells. It's one of the few fragrances that claims to be genderless that I feel actually is great for everybody. It's just right in the middle without leaning towards masculine or feminine. My husband will actually wear it without saying this is women's and refusing and I happily wear it. I do tend to get headaches from strong scents and things I'm not used to and I didn't experience any of that with this fragrance. I would definitely recommend this to friends and family because I feel like it's honestly great for everybody.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first smelled the Dedcool EAU DE XTRA MILK PARFUM, I was immediately drawn in by its cozy and sophisticated scent.. The fragrance is so enticing that I'm sure everyone will love it, no matter what kind of scents they usually prefer. Even people who don't usually wear perfume will find themselves falling in love with the Dedcool EAU DE XTRA MILK PARFUM. The brand has really done a great job of creating a fragrance that is inclusive and inviting.The Dedcool EAU DE XTRA MILK PARFUM also comes in a beautiful and simple package. I can't get enough of the Dedcool EAU DE PARFUM scent. It has quickly become one of my absolute favorites. The way it envelops me in its warm and comforting embrace is truly magical. I find myself reaching for it day after day because I just can't get enough of its inviting aroma.I can't imagine my fragrance collection without it, and I look forward to enjoying its delightful scent for years to come.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: am pleasantly surprised on how much I love this perfume. I wasn't sure what to expect from a gender less perfume but l am a big fan of this perfume now. The scent is smooth on the senses and does not sting or over power like a lot of other perfumes. It is a nice size bottle and sprays out nicely. Very simplistic styling on the bottle which I like, makes it stand out more. I really like how you can layer this scent with other scents available by this same brand. This scent does an excellent job of making it feminine and masculine at the same time. I like how long the scent lasts which I would say is a few hours. Perfumes that last longer than a few hours tend to give me a headache. This is my first time trying this brand and I will definitely be purchasing more in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hi, my name is Charlisa a beauty/haircare guru. Living in north Louisiana. Here's my review of the DedCool XTRA MILK perfume. I want to begin talking about the packaging its such a unique and neutral color. The descriptions are so easy to read and provides insight with a detailed list of what scent notes this perfume carries. One of my favorite scents would be bergamot its gives such a pleasant aroma. Not overbearing with the amber and white musk. All of the scents form together in a sweet harmony. That lingers all day. The perfume is genderless and vegan. So perfect for all your friends and family. DedCool is certified organic and cruelty free. The design is so cute and innovative. Made in Los Angeles and the brand does offer other scents that are so pleasant and nice. The spritzier is so durable and strong providing a even application with each spray. Recommended to all perfume lovers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lately, I have been into fragrances and I have picked up the habit of exploring different scents. I have come to learn that I like EDPs, scents that are strong, long lasting and can be layered. I like different notes including wood, Amber, bergamot, and oriental.  I LOVE LOVE LOVE this scent. The smell is similar to milk which I loved (but didnu2019t feel it lasted long enough), but with an extra pow wow. Itu2019s more potent and lasts longer, almost all day. Itu2019s sweet but not too sweet. Itu2019s also cozy, warm, inviting, seductive. Itu2019s just so hard to describe this scent. I was so excited when I got it, sprayed it at home and my husband instantly asked me what I had on. I kept smelling myself after I applied it. The only sad part is you get nose blind to the scent but even after that has occurred, I guarantee you that others can still smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this scent and how the bottle looks. It looks very Minimal and chic. The smell stays on your clothes and body for a long time. I love how the scent is truly unisex and smells great on me and my partner! I get compliments all the time wearing Xtra Milk!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a new fan of Dedcool, I was very excited to get to try the Xtra Milk fragrance.  I absolutely love their Sunlit Blooms fragrance, and wear it everyday.  Being a professional makeup artist in Los Angeles, I am lucky that I get to try lots of new products for myself and for my clients. I am so happy to have recently discovered Dedcool and have been extremely impressed thus far.  I appreciate that they are a local Los Angeles brand, and that they are aiming to be a unique voice in the beauty realm.  Clean, non toxic, vegan ingredients that are fresh and paired in interesting combinations.  The Dedcool Xtra Milk fragrance is no exception to this rule.  It is really different, and it took me a while to figure it out.  It isn't a scent that I would normally be drawn too, as it is a bit more unisex/masculine than I normally choose.  But once I started wearing it regularly, I realized what it reminded me of.  It reminds me of the smell of the lobby of a really high end hotel.  Everytime I'm in an exclusive hotel, I usually comment on how amazing it smells in the lobby, and then I'm usually asking the front desk what that fragrance is.  The Dedcool Xtra Milk is exactly that, in my opinion.  An expensive smelling, gender neutral, slightly masculine smell.  I would probably prefer it as a candle, but that's just personal preference.  If you're looking for something unique that will set you apart, give this fragrance a try.

reviews.review_title: A Sensory Delight: DedCool Xtra Milk Perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk has been a game-changer in my fragrance collection. Its functional purpose of providing a long-lasting, unique scent has truly exceeded my expectations. Whether it's a hectic workday or a cozy weekend brunch, this perfume effortlessly elevates my presence, leaving a lasting impression. The scent has a comforting warmth with a hint of mystery, making it perfect for any occasion. The sleek, minimalist bottle adds a touch of sophistication to my vanity. It's not just a perfume; it's a sensorial escape into a world of elegance. I wholeheartedly recommend DedCool Xtra Milk to those seeking a fragrance that seamlessly blends into diverse lifestyles. Its versatility caters to various settings, making it a must-have for professionals and free spirits alike. The perfume is especially well-suited for individuals who appreciate a balance of sophistication and whimsy.

reviews.review_title: I love the other scents in this line, butu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was first introduced to this brand with the Sunlit Blooms scent and I throughly enjoyed it. Because this particular scent is hailed as the signature for this line, I was very excited to try it. Unfortunately, I was a bit let down. Before I get to that, I want to express that I absolutely love the mixture of warm notes and that it creates a universal musk. I almost always layer my scents and this would be a great addition to the mix. However, when I initially used it, the scent was borderline nonexistent. I figured it mustu2019ve somehow been user error, so I tried using it again and again only to arrive at the same disappointing result. Iu2019m aware that this line of fragrances can be layered or worn alone, but for this to be considered a u201cparfumu201d, I expected  more. Needless to say, my experience with this scent was lackluster. Iu2019m wondering if I just got a bad batch because this was quite the opposite of my positive experience with some of the other scents in this line.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for those who donu2019t like perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After wearing the dedcool perfume u201c extra milk u201c for about a week , I have decided that Iu2019m actually not the biggest fan . Only because I can barely smell it at all . Not really in wasps or up close .  I personally prefer strong perfumes and I am guilty of over spraying but perfumes and fragrances make me happy and have the power to change my mood and confidence. This perfume smells ever so slightly like your average skin scents such as Ellis Brooklyn iso gamma ,  or the riddle oil .  I can still wear it , I just canu2019t smell it . Itu2019s a u201c your skin but better u201c scent , the perfect kind of perfume for people who donu2019t like perfume.  Itu2019s very very light .   The bottle is completely blank except for a barcode which is definitely different but very clean looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Fragrance Extra Milk presents a captivating olfactory journey, blending bergamot, white musk, and amber notes into a genderless vegan fragrance. While initially light, its bold and refreshing aroma gradually unfolds, making it a perfect choice for the spring and summer seasons.The fragrance opens with a burst of citrusy bergamot, offering a crisp and invigorating sensation. As it settles, the delicate essence of white musk adds depth and sophistication, complementing the initial freshness with a subtle warmth. Finally, the lingering amber base note infuses the fragrance with an alluring complexity, leaving a lasting impression.Although it may take some time to fully appreciate its intricacies, DedCool Fragrance Extra Milk's cool and fresh character makes it well-suited for various occasions. Whether worn casually during the day or for an evening soiree, its versatility shines through.One notable aspect of DedCool Fragrance Extra Milk is its commitment to vegan formulations, aligning with ethical values and preferences. Additionally, its genderless appeal ensures its accessibility to a diverse range of individuals.In summary, DedCool Fragrance Extra Milk offers a sophisticated and modern fragrance experience. With its light yet bold personality, it leaves a memorable mark, making it a worthy addition to any fragrance connoisseur's collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here's another beautifully unique clean and warming fragrance I'd love to wear on any season. Though i think i can fully enjoy this scent in spring and summer. The Dedcool Xtra Milk fragrance with notes of Bergamot, White Musk and Amber. The scent is clean and decadent yet not overwhelming. The harmony of sweetness, lactonic, a slight hint of citrus sure brightens the mood all day (or night!). the sweetness and powdery scent of white musk lingers for hours. There are several occasions when I feel like the scent has worn off but then I would get a compliment that I smell really nice   I'd say this scent smells wonderful as is but it also is very versatile and can be used for layering. I love the combination of Xtra Milk and their Taunt scent. Very very amazing and sophisticated.  Longevity wise, it is definitely long wearing for me. First time i wore this scent at night after shower, and got transferred to my night gown, which I can still smell for a couple days now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Normally, I am a gourmand fragrance fan, but I had heard great things about Dedcool and I was dying to try them out. I am very happy to say that I am not disappointed with this scent at all. It is not gourmand in anyway shape or form, but it has this really beautiful, clean with a hint of musk, very skin like sent to it. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little timid on trying a unisex perfume. I am more of a vanilla, floral type of perfume girl. I was SHOCKED on how much I fell in love with this perfume! It smells so good, I love the hints of vanilla and spice. The smell is not over baring and does not give me a headache. I am an esthetician, so I sit and stand over people all day, and I have gotten so many compliments on the smell. The size of this is amazing too, I feel like it will last for a long time. I love the simple packaging of this perfume, it is simple but very unique. I feel like this is perfect mixture of sweet and floral. I can see how it could be unisex, but I feel that women would gravitate towards this more because of how heavenly it smells! This will be a perfume I constantly reach for now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been a pro makeup artist for eight years and although I love all things beauty, Iu2019ve struggled to tap into the fragrance market. I have sinus disease and am highly sensitive to fragrance and many scents trigger migraines. When I first tried Dedcool a few months ago I was so pleased that I couldnu2019t wait to try Xtra Milk. Holy moly, I am obsessed! Musk scents are my favorite and smelling this gave me such a sense of nostalgia. This fragrance lasts longer than expected although itu2019s a layering scent, and it smells soft, comfortable and sexy in my opinion. I love being able to enjoy this fragrance in a more personal way but also embracing that I can still wear fragrance. No migraine triggers for me while wearing this fragrance and I barely needed to re-apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading a lot of the reviews I had saw that the perfume did not last for many. But I really love it! It lasted the whole night for me and I received many compliments about the scent! Also explaining the name of the brand to people was fun. The Amber really shined through out of all the scents in the perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a self-confessed fan of the House of Dedcool, I believe in Carina's mission and vision and as a person of gender-fluidity, on paper this scent is right up my alley and speaks to my very soul.   Not so fast. Sadly my body chemistry vetoed Xtra Milk and as such, we're not on great terms. Pains me to type these words.    With notes of citrus, musk and amber, Xtra Milk could be your Ride Or Die - it's everything you could possibly want in a genderless, totally unassuming, clean and crisp scent - strong, bold, safe and pleasing. In line with all Dedcool, Xtra Milk comes in the brand's signature bottle complete with a clear glass bottle, clear liquid, fine mister and barcode print. So unmistakable, so genius, such an elegant and clean-cut gem.   The juice itself doesn't stain clothes (thank you Mama Carina!), spray mists fine and wide allowing for easy application. First I'm hit with a super cold, almost icy bergamot juice+leaves - green, fresh, citrusy air. It's a sobering experience and not often found in a perfume bottle. Unique.    The top lasts for a significant amount of time, more than most. At least on my skin that initial spray remains for 2 hours at least. It's a beast that doesn't want to be tamed.    In the drydown, cetalox (that's not even listed as a note!) comes through and practically remains til the very end. My nose simply cannot pick up on anything else other than this artificial grey ambergris (I'm pretty sure was created by Givaudan back in the 1950's) and I can't shake it.    All in all, I couldn't make it work on its own. I feel it's a scent that screams for being layered. Either as a base for better things to come or as a topper to soften overly woodsy or overly sweet fragrances.    For reference I'm a MASSIVE fan of Frangrance 01 Taunt and been wearing it for months as well as Red Dakota, Blonde and Sunlit Blooms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a fragrance junkie since my aunt introduced me to luxury perfumes and colognes when I was a pre-teen, being a woman I don't typically like real feminine scents though, my taste has has leaned toward either unisex or genderless scents and even alot of men's fragrances. This was my second experience trying the Dedcool brand and I knew I would love it before even receiving it because I LOVE White Musk! The story behind the brand is very inspiring also, if you haven't familiarized yourself with it you should! The Extra Milk is a perfect base scent if your plan is to layer, it's soft, clean, memorable but not over powering.. You literally just want to sniff your wrists all day because it smells so amazing! This is literally my perfect type of scent! Genderless is a perfect word for it because it literally could take on the form of feminity or masculinity or even just anyone! It's what I would describe as ideal. I really can't see anyone disliking this fragrance!

reviews.review_title: Most unique scent Iu2019ve ever smelled
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really intrigued by the name 'Extra Milk' when I first heard about this fragrance, so naturally, I couldn't wait to try it out and see how it smelled!  With its mix of Bergamot giving off a lovely citrusy scent, white musk adding a sweet and fresh aroma, and Amber providing a cozy balance, it's a beautiful blend that's almost addictive!  One thing I was impressed by is how long-lasting this fragrance is! I didn't have to reapply it throughout the day; it stayed just as strong as when I first sprayed it.  Another great thing about this fragrance is that it's gender-neutral and works amazingly well! It's perfect for everyday wear and suits any occasion!  I've received so many compliments while wearing it! I just can't get over how good it smells! You won't regret making this fragrance part of your daily routine! I highly recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is the literal definition of your skin but better! By itself it is very light and musky which gives you the clean girl aesthetic everyone is going for now a days! I find this to be the best layering perfume! When mixed with other scents it leaves you with a unique signature scent that everyone will ask you for! In my opinion you can really smell the amber and bergamot when sprayed by itself. I find it to be best paired with another one of my signature scents u201cyouu201d by glossier! It really gives me a signature scent as they both are unique to your skin! I love that it is nontoxic, vegan and genderless! My husband has actually been reaching for this cause it smells different on him than it does me! Ladies if youu2019re looking for a creamy sheer scent to layer for longer scent this is your best friend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra Milk is a heartwarming amber adaptive scent that intensifies once applied to your pulse points. It also boasts of subtle yet indulgent bergamot and white musk that complement each other and supplement the amber to provide a light clean and soft fragrance elixir. I really enjoy the presence of amber in my fragrances because of the warmth it adds to my natural essence. With Xtra Milk, I noticed how subtle the fragrance wraps into the skin at first and then slowly develops a potent yet lightweight aroma that is not overpowering but adequately robust and a dynamic blend of the three fragrance notes: Amber, Bergamot, and White Musk. I think this fragrance is perfect for layering or for use as a statement in itself. I would definitely recommend this to those looking for a daily fragrance that is hearty and warm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am perfume fanatic! Xtra Milk is the perfect layering fragrance! It is good on its own, but I think it excels when itu2019s layered with another fragrance. I love a musky fragrance and xtra milk leads with a white musk and bergamot scent, with a finishing amber as the bottom note. Itu2019s sidle yet lasts throughout they

reviews.review_title: Such a good Layering scent or on its own.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra Milk was my introduction to Dedcool fragrances and I couldnu2019t be more thrilled with this product. It smells great on its own, but also pairs well with the other fragrances from this brand. I did also have a change to try one of the discovery sets and I wasnu2019t a fan of all the scents in their own, but when I added it to the mix it just spruce them up a bit and made them more to my liking.  Also, this is extremely long lasting. I not only like spray scents on my skin, but also my clothing and I can say that I can still smell this on my clothing the next day. The longevity on the skin is it good 10 hours I would say typically I can smell this on one wrist more than the other all the way up until I take a shower. With that being said, I feel like this fragrance is well worth the cost because with how long it lasts on the skin, youu2019re definitely getting your moneys worth, and youu2019re not having to reapply throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me explain. This isnu2019t milky in a spoil-in-your-fridge way. This is milky in a sensual, smooth way. Everyone says itu2019s like u201cyour skin but betteru201d but it is true!  It takes a minute, or a day, to fully grasp this scent profile. Notes of dusky amber break through, though lightly, to greet your nose followed by the intimacy of white musk. Itu2019s a personal experience. Itu2019s unlike any other perfume Iu2019ve ever worn.  Iu2019m almost giddy to have a full bottle because I want to take this u201coh I just smell like thisu201d vibe with me wherever I go FOREVER. Like, ultimate cool girl vibes.  I smell like a girl who thrifts the best pieces and orders matcha and turns in all of her work on time. And, I smell like me.   I LOVE this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I  had an interesting experience with Dedcool xtra milk . Despite my love for the notes and the overall scent, I found that it had a musky and amber fragrance, which was perfect for wearing after a shower. However, I was only able to smell the fragrance when I was sniffing my skin, which was a bit disappointing. I even tried showering with the fragrance, but strangely enough, I still couldn't smell anything.  On the other hand, I found that if I sprayed it on my wrist in the morning, I could still smell it after 12 hours had passed but only if Iu2019m sniffing my skin. So, in terms of longevity, the fragrance was perfect. However, I noticed that the overall performance was poor, as the scent was not very noticeable, and I could only smell it when I was in close proximity to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a complete perfume junkie and always looking for new and exciting fragrances to try. Dedcool seems like such a fresh and unique approach to fragrance and I love that their whole style appeals to everyone. The brand makes a point to not lean towards falling into polarizing feminine or masculine scent categories. Xtra Milk is so addictive and I canu2019t stop smelling myself! The longevity is great and I can smell this on myself all day long, even though overall projection is light. This is perfect for a crowd pleasing everyday fragrance. I got complimented immediately from my family at first spray. They noticed right away that I was wearing something new and told me how good I smelled! If you love lightly sweet and nice clean fragrances that are perfect for layering or simply letting shine on their own, this one is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let Dedcool XTRA MILK be your newest OBSESSION!! The Xtra Milk fragrance is the perfect balance of light and breezy with notes of Amber, Bergamot, and White Musk making it the perfect transitional scent!! Easily take it from day to night by adding a few more sprits or layering it with any other scent from Dedcool! Itu2019s light and airy yet strong without feeling like you walked strait into a powder puff. Xtra Milk is seriously long lastingu2026 I could still smell it hours later and we all know thatu2019s a rare find!! I love what this brand stands for and that the Dedcool brand goes beyond the glass bottle with scents that are vegan, non toxic, and sustainable!! The packaging is also non biodegradable and not to mention super cool. I love that this scent blends with your skin and smells uniquely you!! Give Dedcool a try. I promise it will be your new obsession!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a beauty enthusiast and love experimenting with new perfumes and scents. The Decool Xtra Milk Fragrance is a really interesting product! To start with, I love the packaging. I think the barcode design is really clean-looking and I love how it looks on my dresser! The smell is really nice as well. It's definitely a bit of an understated scent- if you're someone who prefers strong scents, this is not the product for you. That said, it definitely smells a little warm and musky, and also clean and comforting. I  really enjoy the smell! I also tried out layering the Xtra Milk Fragrance with some other perfumes I had and found that it really added a nice extra note to those scents- I think it definitely works really well for layering if you're someone who likes to layer scents. It's definitely a genderless scent, and I think it would work for pretty much anyone! I also love that this product is nontoxic and vegan- it is definitely a high-quality fragrance, and you can tell a lot of thought went into the product. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a nice mellow scent to add to their beauty routine, or to anyone looking for a nice layering fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool's Xtra Milk perfume is a standout in the fragrance world. First off, it's genderless, which means it's made for everyone. The scent is truly specialu2014it's like a fresh breeze with a comforting twist. Imagine the creamy goodness of milk mixed with subtle notes of vanilla and sandalwood. It's a unique combination that's both soothing and sophisticated. What's even better is its staying power. Once you spray it on, it sticks with you all day, ensuring you smell amazing from morning till night. And let's talk about the packagingu2014simple, chic, and totally Instagram-worthy. Overall, if you're looking for a fragrance that's one-of-a-kind, long-lasting, and inclusive, Xtra Milk by DedCool is the perfect choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool Xtra milk is my favorite perfume at the moment. It is a blend of cozy, clean, warm and fresh. I get so many compliments. I absolutely love this perfume. The scent is dreamy and the ingredients are excellent. I like the fact that it is vegan. It is definitely worth the price. The Extra Milk is clean with a musky scent that makes it smell like something I've never smelled before. Slightly powdery, floral and fresh. It is very unique, and it will blend with your personal skin scent and make it a one of a kind.Anyone who love fragrances will know how awesome it is to get compliments from people on your scent. I am obsessed with this perfume. I use it everyday and it lasts so long. Overall Iu2019m very satisfied with this perfume and I highly recommend it to everyone. Must buy, it smells like pure comfort.

reviews.review_title: Simple Fresh Milk scent Yet Lasts long!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My honest experience opinion for the new Dedcool perfume Product Xtra Milk is great upon using it for a week now.  To be honest it's not my favorite but I like the scent smells gentle simple and fresh It's not overpowering not too strong for my liking it's just right for me.  I love that it is an Eau de parfum where I know that when you are looking for a perfume that will last long you need to look for an eau de parfum and definitely this Xtra Milk perfume does it and it last all day when I was wearing it.  Let's talk about the ingredients and I am happy and satisfied with it .  I love the Genderless concept where anyone can use it both Female and Male.I could definitely recommend it to my hubby or family members I know they will share it.  I love that it is Vegan and It's made in LA CA USA. To bw honest I prefer products that are made and produced in USa for some personal reasons and preference and like cheap ingredients and contaminations. So I am impressed with brand Dedcool and this perfume.This is not my favorite scent so far but I would use it. I will definitely recommend to anyone and of course I'll explore more Dedcool perfumes options and find my next favorite scent.

reviews.review_title: A new way to play with fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 32 year old beauty enthusiast and I live in Arizona. I have an affinity with perfume. I like to change my scent based on how I am feeling (or want to feel), where I am going and what I am doing. I like to be able to smell the fragrance on me but I donu2019t want to overwhelm others that I am close to by overly dosing myself in fragrance.   I am obsessed with DedCool. As a millennial myself I can really relate to the brand and its aesthetic. One of my favorite things about DedCool is that they are the only Functional Fragrance brand that helps you discover fragrances in a new way by being who you are. They really help their customers experience a new way to play, shape and customize fragrance through individual discovery. Itu2019s so unique and freeing to be able to mix or layer different fragrances to make it my very own. Itu2019s allowed me to be more creative in figuring out what I like to smell like and how I can easily customize that scent myself.   I love the Xtra Milk Fragrance. Itu2019s such a unique scent of Bergamot, White Musk and Amber. I donu2019t have any other perfumes that are similar or even close. I like that it is a genderless, clean fragrance but still feels feminine and like me. Every day Iu2019ve worn Xtra Milk Iu2019ve had people come up and smell me asking me what smelled so good. Iu2019ve found that it lasts all day and I can sneak a sniff of myself even at the end of the night and still smell it on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of Dedcool Xtra Milk. It is a universally unique scent which I find can compliment just about anyone. I love that it can enhance other fragrances. The bergamon really opens the scent and then the musky amber stays and comforts you. It really is effortlessly sexy and it makes me feel like I can wear it day and night. It truly is a very user friendly scent that doesn't overpower but it does have stay power. I would recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have worked in the beauty industry for over 5 years and while fragrance was never my expertise I have always had an appreciation for it. I am not new to trying Dedcool fragrance. This will be the second Dedcool scent I have tried and wow, I love it almost as much as the first. I have a huge appreciation for the brand and what they stand for. Fragrance is one of those things in life that needs to be modernized. I am one of those people who smells a scent and automatically associate it with a gender but I am actively trying to avoid doing this because people can be who they want and smells how they want.    After using this fragrance for a little under a week I can say this scent lasts for so long, seriously all day. I love that about this. This scent has a nice musk note, but it still smells sweet and not overly sweet like candy. It is a great everyday scent and I think this would make a great layering scent. As for the packaging, I love love love the simplicity of the barcode.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect valentine perfume for me. I am a perfume enthusiast and always go to Sephora to find a scent I can call my own and I think Iu2019ve finally found it! Dedcool has always been a brand Iu2019ve kept tabs on. Last year I blindly bought TAUNT and I loved it. It smells like a grown up fruity pebbles mixed with your scent but better. I finally got my hands on the Xtra Milk and omg itu2019s beautiful and even stronger than the original Milk scent which personally, I couldnu2019t smell on myself. Xtra Milk smells like me in the best way possible. Itu2019s verrry similar to Nematu2019s amber perfume oil. If you love amber, bergamot, and musk then this is definitely for you. I get sooo many compliments when I wear this from complete strangers. Itu2019s the type of scent where your nose adjusts to it and you forget you sprayed it on but everyone around you seems to notice. Itu2019s so elegant and classy yet not overpowering in any way which is good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk is a fragrance that promises a delightful olfactory journey with its creamy and alluring scent profile. However, my experience with this fragrance was not as enchanting as I had hoped. Despite my excitement to try it out, the scent did not resonate with me upon application. It simply didn't work for my personal taste.However, despite my disappointment with the fragrance itself, I think that it could potentially serve as a layering option. While it didn't captivate me on its own, I believe it could add a subtle touch of complexity when paired with other scents in my collection.One aspect of DedCool Xtra Milk that I truly appreciate is the brand's unwavering commitment to sustainability and clean beauty. The fragrance is vegan, cruelty-free, and made with natural, non-toxic ingredients. This aligns with my values as a conscious consumer, making it a guilt-free indulgence despite my personal experience with the scent.In terms of packaging, DedCool opts for a clean and simple design, foregoing the ornate collector's bottles often seen in the fragrance world. While this minimalist approach may not appeal to everyone, it reflects the brand's focus on simplicity and sustainability.Although my personal encounter with DedCool Xtra Milk didn't result in the compliments and inquiries I've heard others receive, I acknowledge that fragrance is highly subjective. What didn't resonate with me might be adored by someone else. Despite my own experience, I recognize the potential allure of Xtra Milk for those whose olfactory preferences align more closely with its scent profile.

reviews.review_title: Like a warm hug! Yummy second skin scent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am really in love with this brand. I think their unisex fragrances and design aesthetic is so welcoming to everyone. If you are the kind of person who loves to smell like the best version of your skinu2026if you just took a shower and you are in cozy sweats and giving someone a hug! I have such aversion to chemical smells and this just meshes perfectly with you skin. I layer it with lotion and some other of the Dedcool scents I have. The bottle looks gorgeous on my vanity and itu2019s an amazing value in my opinion. This is also a scent I like to spray on my sweaters because itu2019s so subtle itu2019s not one that you smell on your skin. So sometimes when I want to smell it to calm me Iu2019ll cuddle my sweaters! I just purchased the detergent in the milk scent which is a milder version. But I loved it so much I want my linens to smell this way. If you are looking for a very powerful spicy fragrance this isnu2019t for you but if you want subtle and lovely and warm and welcoming you will love this! Being vegan is an amazing bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool has quickly become one of my favorite new fragrance brands and their signature scent, Xtra Milk, is no exception. They're vegan, cruelty-free, and carbon-neutral which is so important to me when trying to be an ethical consumer. Xtra Milk is your everyday layering scent that basically smells like my skin, but better, which is my goal when using perfume. I want my perfumes to work with my skin chemistry, not against it, and Xtra Milk works with my skin exceptionally well. The notes in it are amber, bergamot, and white musk. It smells clean, light, and warm - think linens, clean sheets, open windows, after a fresh shower type of feeling, that's what I experience when I wear it. It is a layering scent so it is light on its own, but it adds so much when layered with some of my other favorite perfumes as a base. I have used it underneath DedCool's other scent called Taunt and I found that it added so much more complexity to my skin scent signatures overall. I sometimes have sensitivities to fragrances, but I haven't had any issues with Xtra Milk which is a huge plus in my book! If clean layering scents are your jam, you'll be pleasantly surprised by Xtra Milk.

reviews.review_title: I love Xtra Milku2019s Beautiful Clean Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Michele and Iu2019m a Beauty Expert in my 30u2019s. Iu2019ve been a huge fan of DedCool since I tried their Sunlit Blooms fragrance. I always love playing with scents and seeing how each scent reacts with my skin and body chemistry. Xtra Milk is a stronger scent and concentration of DedCoolu2019s original Milk scent.  I love how the DedCool Xtra Milk fragrance smells on my skin. The Xtra Milk scent is light, clean and perfect for pairing with other fragrances. It smells like clean, fresh linen drying on a line on a nice summer day. Xtra Milk has a scent that reminds me of my grandma. It takes me back to a simpler more relaxing time. Itu2019s like a time capsule. The notes that make up Xtra Milk are Amber, Bergamot and White Musk. The White Musk is what really stands out to me. I almost get a hint of cedar too. Especially after it sets into my skin. This scent will turn heads and get people asking you what you are wearing. Iu2019ll be wearing this scent tomorrow at work. This formula is waterless so you get a more concentrated scent that will last you much longer than other fragrances on your vanity. It also is formulated with 21 power extracts that include mood-boosting and anti-inflammatory properties. I love itu2019s simple elegant packaging with its clear bottle with a black lid and black writing on it. The bottle is 1.7 fluid ounces which is the perfect amount for me. Its barcode symbol is so cool, unique and symbolizes a more genderless approach to fragrances. It also symbolizes how scent is different for everyone. This fragrance is genderless and vegan. Itu2019s not too feminine or masculine. I love how itu2019s a scent for anyone. I would suggest this amazing fragrance to anyone in their 20u2019s and older looking for a fragrance that is genderless, clean, warm and sensual which will enhance their own natural scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a fragrance that is indulgent, delicious, and unisex, you might want to try the Dedcool Extra Milk Genderless eau de parfum. This fragrance is part of the Dedcool line, which is vegan and cruelty-free. It features notes of caramel, almond, and vanilla, creating a sweet and creamy scent that is irresistible. The fragrance is also versatile, as it can be layered with other Dedcool fragrances for a unique twist. I love wearing this fragrance on its own, as it makes me feel cozy and pampered. It also lasts for a long time on my skin, and I have been getting compliments on how good I smell. The bottle is sleek and minimalist.   I highly recommend this fragrance to anyone who loves gourmand scents and wants to treat themselves to something special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool Extra Milk has taken me by surprise with its captivating scent, swiftly becoming my new favorite perfume. The ingenious layering capability allows me to craft countless unique combinations, keeping my fragrance experience fresh and exciting. With consistent use, I am enamored not only with the beautiful yet simple packaging but also with the oil-based formula. Its soft and smooth texture enhances the application experience, and I appreciate the lack of staining issues on my clothes, which is always something to watch out with oil-based products.  From the initial spray, I was entranced by a scent unlike anything I've encountered before. Its subtle sweetness strikes a perfect balance, avoiding overwhelming notes. Wearing it daily has resulted in an influx of compliments, with people frequently inquiring about the captivating fragrance. Notably, friends and family were quick to purchase this gem after trying it for themselves.  What sets Dedcool Extra Milk apart is its compatibility with other fragrances; experimenting with layering has consistently yielded delightful results. For anyone seeking a uniquely beautiful scent, I highly recommend giving this perfume a tryu2014I guarantee you'll fall in love, just as I have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love DedCool's simple but cool packaging. It's a functional bottle that doesn't take up more space than necessary yet the barcode makes it stand out. I believe all fragrance should be genderless so I am happy to see the packaging reflect this.  Xtra Milk is supposed to be a stronger version of Milk but I think it smells different. Milk is very faint and I only use that for an enhancer. Xtra Milk is stronger and can stand on its own. The musk is very noticeable so you will love it if you love musk. It smells nice on its own but where it really shines for me is for layering.   Unlike Milk, this is strong enough to make a difference when used in layering. You can smell the complexity coming through. My fav combo is Xtra Milk + Red Dakota, absolutely fav pairing!

reviews.review_title: The fragrance I didn't know I needed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had seen DedCool on social media and was intrigued by the brand and also ingredients. The fact that no water is used in their fragrance left me extremely intrigued. It is said that because no water is used, it will last longer. And that is so true. I have been spraying this in the morning and at the end of the day, I cam still getting compliments on my fragrance.   Xtra Milk is also unique because it can be worn on its own, or used as a base fragrance to layer. I'll be honest, I am new to layering fragrances, but gave it a try and it's like a whole new world has been opened up. Xtra Milk is the perfect base for layering any fragrances. With that said, I also love wearing it on it's own. It smells fresh and clean and I feel energized when I apply it in the morning. And it truly is genderless, because my hubby is now borrowing it. I'm going to have to get him his own bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a thirty some year old who lives in the city, I like to wear fragrances that make me memorable. This scent by DedCool is truly memorable. However it is not my favorite scent. Although the scent is unisex, I can say that it would fit a male better, as I felt that it was a strong scent for me. It has sweet notes that made me sneeze quite a bit. However, the positive side is that if this is a scent you enjoy, it does last for a long time. It stayed on me and my clothes for almost a full eight hours. I like that it feels to be oil based, meaning high quality! At the end of the day it smelled softer, which I would prefer from the get go. A little goes a long way, so this bottle will last for a while! The packaging is simple yet artsy, which is very genderless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was truly impressed with this product. First and foremost it smelled so good!! This is my first time introduced to this brand and itu2019s a guarantee re-purchase for sure. It mixed so well with my body chemistry.This fragrance is a sophisticated blend that is perfect for those who appreciate a complex and layered scent experience. This scent can be worn day or night.The combination of bergamot, white musk, and amber creates a harmonious blend that is both alluring and comforting. It created a warm and enveloping aroma that lingered on my skin. This fragrance is perfect for anyone looking for a unique and captivating scent that will leave a lasting impression. The packaging and bottle is also memorable. It has a modern and minimalist aesthetic that appeals to those who appreciate understated elegance and a touch of luxury.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off wow I was very nervous with this scent due to the name. Now, Iu2019m obsessed literally going to make sure I am restocked with this fragrance. Due to the name I thought it was going to smell like milku2026 not was I wrong. When you first spray you are met with hints of bergamot that are consumed a few seconds later by amber and white musk creating this musky yet sweet scent. The top note of this scent is bergamont, the heart and base notes are white musk and amber. While this fragrance is similar to its sister fragrance milk, xtra milk has a more masculine musk that is intertwined with a bitter sweetness. This scent gives a refreshing and empowering impression itu2019s a scent that lingers even after you are already gone. I adore how this fragrance leaves people wondering who is she.

reviews.review_title: A nice clean fragrance, smells like fresh sheets
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 30 year old female who absolutely loves fragrances. My favourite notes are musky, woody, oud! Sometimes I do enjoy fruity and floral fragrances as well. I did not even open the box and I immediately loved the first whiff I got from Dedcool Xtra milk. The things that I love about it is thatu2019s it genderless, clean and waterless. I am not great at describing the notes but this smells like clean laundry at first and once it dries down, it is like fresh sheets. It does not really do anything for me alone, but I like layering it with Red Dakota or Taunt from Dedcool itself. It does stay on my skin for several hours but it gets really subtle after 2 hours. Overall I was extremely excited when I saw milk as a note because thatu2019s different, but I am not a fan. I usually wear it at night or spray around my bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a content creator with over 10 years experience in the fragrance industry and I can honestly say that the first time I used this perfume I knew it was distinctly different. This scent is warm and Inviting and mysteriously addicting,as it doesn't smell like a perfume to me, it's more like a a sensuous skin enhancer that brings my skin's natural scent to life.After falling in love with wearing this fragrance by itself,I started to experiment with wearing it layered with my other fragrances and found that it enhanced every perfume in my collection,which basically gave me an entire new wardrobe of scents and options.I think this perfume is perfect for anyone that likes a natural,inviting cozy scent,however I would not recommend it to those that prefer a strong perfume scent,as this is definitely not that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just wanna preface this review by making it clear that I actually do love this brand of perfume and this isnu2019t the first fragrance theyve given me but in the interest of remaining objective and honest I do have to admit that I did not enjoy this fragrance at all. Itu2019s not that it smells bad, but my senses couldnt really capture the scent of this fragrance. To me, it barely smelled like anything no matter how much I sprayed. Funny thing though, I asked my roommate to try it right after I did and she loves it. She thought it smelled great and described it as being light but in my opinion itu2019s too subtle for my body chemistry Iu2019m assuming. I know different fragrances smell differently on different people so Iu2019m just going to chop it up as this fragrance simply isnu2019t for me. I think Iu2019ll stick to the sunlit bloom fragrance from This line because itu2019s my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra milk is a warm and cozy scent in my opinion. It has a bright sweet bergamot opening and a warm amber base. There's a kind of cozy skin musk that makes it feel like a very personal fragrance. An easy everyday scent or perfect for layering with the others. The amber and musk sit close, but linger all day. It's the scent version of pulling your favorite bathrobe out of the dryer and wrapping it around you while it's still warm.   I personally would consider it to be very unisex and appropriate for anyone. It's definitely an easy reach and I can't imagine a time or place where it would be inappropriate to wear. This would be a perfect signature scent for a medical provider or office worker who wants a soft sweet fragrance that isn't too loud and isn't likely to cause allergies or reactions in others. It's a natural and nontoxic formula. I even feel comfortable letting my youngest daughter wear it because I know it's gentle on her skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably my new favorite perfume, I love it so much. I usually gravitate towards fruitier scents but I am open to all kinds of scents. I am a scent fanatic and I love discovering new products to add to my collection. This scent is hard to describe but it is soft and has an almost powdery smell to it. It sort of makes me think of the era 1920s, paris. To me this smell is sultry and has a hint of flowers. To be more accurate it consists of bergamot, white musk and amber. I spray this on my chest, neck, legs, arms and wrists. Not always on those spots all together but at seperate times. Really does last all day and it is said to be genderless. I could see both genders using this perfume. The perfume looks like water in the bottle and it is simple but cute. I like how it is designed, it has this cool bar code in the front.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has been getting more into fragrances in the last few years, I was very excited to try this one out for myself.  This fragrance - by itself - is not really for me. Honestly, I don't get much scent from it. But, it being light is not a real problem. It's definitely a light and clean fragrance.  Since it's advertised as genderless, I did spray some on my honey as well. I think he enjoyed it more than I did.  That having been said, this fragrance is made for layering. So, when you apply this as a base with another DedCool fragrance over it, that is when the magic truly happens. They will combine to form a fragrance that is unique and truly you.  I would definitely recommend this fragrance to use for layering scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra Milk is the perfect layering fragrance that is a gentle blend of amber, bergamot, and white musk. As a fragrance fanatic, this is not something that I have in my collection and is also my first time using a layering fragrance. This smell is clean, soft, and sweet but not overwhelming. I am very particular with sweet scents cause if the scent is too sweet, it tends to give me headaches. Xtra Milk compliments my other fragrances as it is a great base and adds intensity to hold my other perfumes. Xtra Milk is a great stand alone fragrance for the days that you do not want a strong scent. I feel like this scent enhances your natural smell and it lasts for a very long time. I would use this fragrance for the days when I run errands or even for the gym/ workout days. Simple and clean!

reviews.review_title: Honest Review of DedCool - Xtra Milk Perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fragrance enthusiast with a keen nose for nuanced scents, I embarked on a7-day journey with DedCool's Xtra Milk perfume. Promising a genderless fragrance experience, I was intrigued to explore its olfactory landscape and see if it truly lived up to its claims.  Upon the first spritz, I was immediately enveloped in a cloud of creamy sweetness. However, as the scent settled, I couldn't shake the distinct impression that this perfume leaned heavily towards femininity. Despite the brand's assertion of a genderless formula, Xtra Milk exuded a distinctly floral and powdery aroma that felt tailored to a feminine sensibility.  Over the course of the following days, I experimented with different application techniques and observed how the fragrance evolved on my skin. While the longevity was commendable, lasting well into the evening with only minimal fading, the overwhelming floral undertones persisted, leaving me longing for a more balanced composition.  As someone who appreciates fragrances that transcend traditional gender norms, I couldn't help but feel disappointed by DedCool's missed mark. While the scent itself was undeniably pleasant, its unequivocal association with feminine stereotypes contradicted the brand's inclusive ethos. In its current iteration, Xtra Milk may resonate more strongly with individuals seeking a classically feminine fragrance experience, rather than those in search of a truly genderless scent.  In conclusion, DedCool's Xtra Milk perfume offers a delightful olfactory journey characterized by creamy sweetness and floral elegance. However, its unmistakable alignment with traditional feminine scents undermines the brand's commitment to inclusivity and redefining fragrance norms. Despite its shortcomings in fulfilling its genderless promise, Xtra Milk remains a commendable option for those who embrace and enjoy feminine fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy the simplicity and straightforwardness of the bottle. Itu2019s minimalistic and I think it was very innovative. The scent of this is slightly citrusy, but mainly musk and woody with a hint of sweet. Something strange that I noticed when applying this to my skin, along with the other sample fragrances, is that both Milk and Xtra Milk caused a little bit of redness and welting where I applied them, whereas the others didnu2019t. I have less redness with Xtra Milk and Iu2019m not sure why, but despite that, this scent is in my top two. The more that I smell it on my skin, the more that I grow to love it. I can definitely see myself pairing this with other fragrances that I own, Iu2019m just figuring out what those could be. Iu2019m going to do some cross, referencing, and a little bit of research, between all of the notes to find out what may be causing the redness, so this little homework assignment will be fun for me. Iu2019m still going to use it unless it worsens, but I donu2019t think it willu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I consider myself a devoted enthusiast regarding beautiful scents and fine fragrances. So, I am excited to share my experience with the brandu2019s XTRA Milk scent. From my previous experience with the brandu2019s Sunlit Blooms, I knew the moment I tried this scent, I would fall in love with it. The minimalist packaging is simple, yet there is pure elegance inside the bottle.  From the first spritz, I was engulfed while dancing gracefully to the captivating notes of white musk and bergamot lying on my skin, making me hooked on the amora all day. However, after hours of the scent on my skin, I can seamlessly smell the superstar note of amber mixed with a sweet vanilla undertone. To me, the amber adds the extra savior faire and warmth to this fragrance.  The subtle sweetness of this scent has remarkable staying power that lingers around with each passing hour of my day. I love it! It is a scent that I want to shower in daily. It will turn heads whether I am wearing this intriguing and soft scent at school, running errands, at the gym, or going out. I will be stocking on this one along with the Sunlit Blooms.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A scent loved can inspire you, revive your desire, comfort you or send you traveling through time and space of a past memory. Ded Cool Xtra Milk eau de parfum recounted my days of watching artist hand drawn Saturday morning cartoons and School House rock shorts while feasting on a never ending cereal bowl of floating pastel marshmallows in colored pink milk from a bovine. In the background sits an ornate crystal vase of eternal white carnations wafting an unyielding scent for weeks on end. I could describe this scent as a creamy dusty floral, matching the pattern of the couch cushions. The gender neutral universal musk (amber, bergamot and white musk) borders on refreshing yet sultry, the combination changes throughout the day depending on the amount of perceptible exertion. I have yet to personally experience a scent develop so diversely upon each independent application, which frankly was a fun experience. The scent is lasting but not overpowering, softly lingering morphing into the evening hours. The 1.7 fl. spray clear glass bottle is ample, modern, minimal in design and logo, perfect atop your bedroom dresser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra milk makes me so happy. It's that next day scent of human and it wears differently on everybody. It's a musk and I think everyone has their own natural musk and this mixes and marinated with that to create something super unique.   The packaging is clean and simple. Beautiful and clear, the scent and styling is also quite genderless.   Great price point and it's just something you can casually reach for. I am a walker I spritz the scent into the air and then I walk through it. I find that it just gives a dusting on my persons without coming acrosss too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra Milk is like a candle light dinner and cuddling with your lover after. I instantly get a warm, tingling sensation after spraying this, I feel sexy but I'm also so calm and relaxed. The scent is so smooth and soft. The white musk comes through to me first and really awakens my confidence then the amber and bergamot just elevate my mood! I am so in love with this scent, it's like relaxation In a bottle! It's such a sophisticated scent and it floods me with so many great emotions! I wear this everyday, I spray it on my wrist and i can smell it all day! There's so many words I can use to describe it but it still would not do it justice, it's so unique and unlike any other perfume I've tried! I'm absolutely obsessed and so satisfied with this as my daily perfume!! It's amazing!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, Sexy, and My New Favorite Fragrance!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finding a new perfume or body spray (which I usually wear to work), is a difficult task for me, as I am one that leans more towards the Musk and Bergamot scents. Both of which are incredibly hard to find! As a female, I'm not one who likes the floral scents or scents that smell extremely sweet. DeDCool has hit the mark on every point that I would look for, in the Xtra Milk perfume! As soon as you open the box, you are hit with the smells of Bergamot, White Musk, and Amber, which to me, are extremely sensual scents! The bottle is plain but with a purpose! Every element of this product is brought with thought down to the barcode on the bottle, the descriptions on the side of the box, and even the scent itself! Every person, no matter the gender can wear this perfume and have an instant boost of confidence! DeDCool is going to rock the perfume world with its innovative and beautiful line of scents.

reviews.review_title: Has zero smell (for me) and lasting power
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this perfume only to find I couldnu2019t smell it at all. I was very confused because I have a very keen sense of smell. After some research I discovered that Iu2019m probably one of the rare group of people that is missing the OR5A1 gene that allows you to smell ambroxan, which is a prevalent ingredient/note in this perfume. I had my friend describe the scent to me and she said it smelled really light, airy, sweet and slightly woodsy. It reminded her of being bundled up in a cashmere sweater on a cool day. She also said the scent faded really quickly on me and she couldnu2019t smell it after less than 30 minutes of me applying it. I feel bad leaving a one star review because this is a great company that is so forward thinking, I love that they have so many gender neutral scents and the founder seems really humble and down to Earth. However, I canu2019t rate something highly if I literally canu2019t smell it. My suggestion would be to try this scent in store instead of making a blind purchase online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has a super clean smell to me. It smells sophisticated... if that makes sense. The bergamot notes in this perfume hit the nose with a zesty burst, awakening the senses.  I use it after I shower and spray it with baby oil and lather it all over. It is not overpowering at all.  Unlike other fragrances, the genderless nature of this perfume challenges traditional norms. What sets this fragrance apart is its versatility. It effortlessly adapts to individual body chemistry, creating a bespoke scent that is both personal and alluring. The perfume's ability to blur gender lines is a testament to the progressive spirit of modern perfumery.  This perfume is a must-have for those who appreciate innovation in perfumery and seek a scent that transcends traditional boundaries.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk fragrance offers a pleasant aroma with a clean and airy freshness. When applied to the skin, its scent transforms over time, distinguishing itself from its initial impression in the bottle. Unquestionably distinctive, it presents a fragrance unlike any I've encountered before. Notably, its gender-neutral packaging and vegan, non-toxic composition with anti-inflammatory properties add to its appeal. I appreciate these qualities in personal and beauty products. This fragrance is an excellent alternative for those who prefer subtle, clean scents or are sensitive to overpowering perfumes. However, the musky undertones differ from my taste, so I wouldn't opt to wear Xtra Milk. Nevertheless, the modern and playful packaging and the clear and minimalist glass bottle make it an attractive option, particularly as a gift for someone whose fragrance preferences are unknown, given its lightness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love trying new perfumes and I love all kinds of perfumes, so I was super excited to try out Dedcool's Xtra Milk. The fragrance is a musky, ambery scent with some bergamot mixed in there. I can only describe it as a skin scent but better and sweeter. It is almost addicted to smell, whenever I walk past the bottle i always take a little snif. The scent is strong, but not overwhelming by any means. I have already gotten a few compliments from it. It is a great everyday scent for when you want something light and not overwhelming. It is also great for layering! I have already tried layering it with Decool's Sunlit Blooms & it was great! I can imagine that Xtra Milk does very well with complimenting anything. Since Dedcool's products are less watered down, it does leave an oily residue on the skin. But after a while it does absorb. I also really love the packaging. This is definitely one of my new favorite perfumes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed Cosmetologist, working in the beauty industry for 28 years, I have been introduced to and sampled many yummy fragrances! I am especially attracted to the brand DedCool because it is a vegan and genderless brand that can be worn by anyone for any occasion.
