I also love that the scents are meant to be layered, so you can create your own signature scent!  The DedCool Xtra Milk scent is a yummy, soft but warm scent that makes me want to cuddle up under a blanket for an afternoon nap! The bergamot and amber give an extra cozy feeling with a soft note of spice. The white musk gives a clean scent that draws you in for another sniff!  I love the glass bottle that this is packaged in, with a unique barcode. And this brand is awesome! They create all things scent- even laundry detergent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My background is retail, phytomedicine & currently I am a caregiver.  My experience is, I am a beauty enthusiast and skincare junkie looking for my holy grail of products. My star rating for Dedcool Xtra Milk EDP is a 5 and here is why I love it.. The founder and creator Carina Chaz is breaking down antiquated gender barriers for her products & replacing it with inclusive genderless fragrances. These fragrances are from plant extraction and then formulated with anti-inflammatory & skin soothing extracts as carriers of the fragrance. This is ingenious & what this means is, that this fragrance in a sense is customized to you because, our body chemistry is unique therefore these fragrances smell completely different on each person and are meant for layering to create a unique customizable scent just for you. The fragrance possibilities are limitless and intriguing. This particular fragrance profile is warm &  sensual, the notes are bergamot, amber & white musk. This is a soft fragrance that captures sexy in a bottle. I like that I can spray this fragrance that has a fine mist and decide if I want to add more or interchange it with another scent. Most perfumes are layered with alcohol and water and come out strong and youu2019re kind of stuck with the scent until it wears off and thatu2019s the absolute beauty of Dedcool as a buildable, layering scent with no alcohol or water just pure plant extractions. This is perfect for anyone with skin sensitivity, allergies to synthetic chemicals and anyone who wants to smell amazing or play around & create your signature scent. Smells like you but, better!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool Xtra Milk is so unique and I noticed that it smells different on me and on my friends. Itu2019s a light scent like milk but its got notes of musk and amber and bergamot which are all classic unique scents. I enjoy how itu2019s not sweet or over powering and I enjoy layering this scent on top of other scents also from dedcool. This perfume is genderless and I feel like itu2019s so unique and lasts a long time. It changes the properties of other smells and is so unique when layered with other scents from this collection. I love layering it with blonde which is a black violet and saffron scent and itu2019s intoxicating. I wore this to sleep and applied this under the backside of my neck behind all my hair. When I put my hair up I can still smell it and now it scent has slightly changed and I can smell the musk even more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As an owner of Dedcoolu2019s Sunlit Blooms and original Milk layering fragrance, I was super excited to try out Xtra Milk. I love to be able to wear a subtle fragrance at work as an esthetician, but itu2019s important to me and my clients that I donu2019t smell too pungent. I love Xtra Milk because itu2019s like a u201cyour scent but betteru201d kind of fragrance. The scent is complex, yet wearable for everyone. At first, Xtra Milk smells fresh, clean, and slightly of citrus, but with warmth and depth from white musk. As the fragrance wears throughout the day, it really synthesizes with your bodyu2019s natural odor. Xtra Milk is a universal and everyday scent but is still incredibly unique yet comforting. I also just really love the ethos of this brand. It seems like Dedcool aims to make the category of fragrance more approachable and customizable. I have loved wearing Xtra Milk every day and experimenting with combining it with other fragrances. I love that I am able to create a scent that is unique and true to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What stands out to me about this perfume is its versatility u2013  it's suitable for both men and women, making it inclusive and welcoming to all. Among its notes of amber, bergamot, and white musk, I found amber taking the lead with its deep, musky scent, setting it apart from other fragrances. It's not overpowering, instead, it's delicately balanced, making it a perfect pick for any occasion, whether it's a day at the office, a romantic evening out, or a casual get together with friends. Even though it's light, people always tell me how good I smell when they walk by. The only downside is that it doesn't last all day, which is okay. Considering the luxurious quality of the perfume, it isn't entirely unexpected. It is perfect for people like me who want a fragrance that effortlessly complements their style and personality.  If you're looking for something elegant that fits any occasion, I would recommend you giving it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells like my new obsession! Dedcool honestly never misses on their fragrances, and Xtra Milk has secured its spot in my top 3 favorites. I wouldn't say the scent reminds me of literal milk, more of a mmm that's good smell. Xtra Milk's scent evokes you-but-better plus fresh-out-the-salon-hair. It's clean, comforting, and alluring all at once. It's hard to compare it to other fragrances because it is so complex and unique. If you like Glossier You, you will be OBSESSED with Xtra Milk. This scent lasts all day long, and I can still smell it on my shirt collar the next day. However, it manages to be long-lasting without being overbearing. My sensitive skin and nose have zero issues with the Xtra Milk formula. The first time I wore it and hugged my boyfriend, he said I smell like 'girl', in the best way haha. The bottle has a nice weight to it, and effortlessly sprays into a fine-mist. I know l'll be reaching for my Xtra Milk bottle everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always looking for a new signature scent, whether it be for the day or nighttime or something that works all day. This perfume allows to build your signature fragrance by acting as a base to help enhance the other subtle tones of other perfumes. When I first tried it, on my body it smelled more masculine and being a genderless fragrance I felt that it was possible to make it my own and more feminine. Pairing this fragrance with more feminine undertones really made it pop and it smells amazing now. I did rate it 4 stars as it doesn't last quite as long on the body, however ever since I sprayed it in my living room the smell has yet to leave. It's been smelling like Xtra milk for days and I'm not mad. You can wear this on its own or pair it with your favorite scent either way I highly recommend you try it. You never know if your new signature scent is just waiting for the extra oomph of Xtra Milk.

reviews.review_title: This fragrance is a must try.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk- This scent is a beautiful Musky light weight scent that is well rounded and good for men and woman. I love the way it sits on my skin after it settles. Long lasting that will last all day. I actually put it on over a scent free lotion the lotion actually took on the scent which made it wear all day and night. I spray it on my neck area as well as my wrists. I also sprayed a little in the air and walked through it so it would land on my hair, and I got compliments on this scent all night long. very light scent of amber +bergamot mixed with white musk. This is a definite must try! As a Professional Esthetician I recommend this sent because it is so light that everyone can use it and it won't overwhelm you! Quick go and get yours as they are sure to sell out soon! Well done DedCool! Adore it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am going to add this perfume to my favorite list. I love the scent as it is intoxicating and so soothing. I always get compliments whenever I use it. Everyone keeps asking me what I am wearing, and why I always smell good. I am so happy that I found the right scent for me. I really like the size because I am a traveler and it is perfect to carry around. The scent is not too strong. I think it is going to be my signature scent from now on. It is a beautiful, subtle scent that is not overwhelming. It is also last long. I still can smell it the next day. It is vegan friendly which is great for everyone. I will repurchase it as soon as I finish it. Xtra milk is such a perfect name for it. It is hands down my new favorite for everyday wear. I highly recommend this if you love wearing perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say? This stuff is awesome for layering, as well as on its own. But it really does it's thing if you spray on top of your other favorite fragrance and just let the magic work. It really puts me in my comfort zone when I smells this stuff, it's almost like a  very clean laundry type smell. It also lasted for 10-12 hrs on my skin, I'm also sure my clothes still smells like it. It's very oily but it lasts very well. I enjoyed it overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a beauty enthusiast for many years but in them many of years I have never experienced a brand as unique as Dedcool nor have I come across a fragrance like Dedcool Xtra Milk that is so fun but yet sensual . The sunny citrus scent of bergamot, fresh delicate white musk and rich warm amber blend so well together to make an invigorating aroma. I love the fact that it is not too overpowering like some perfumes can be. It is just the right intensity. It lasts all day on your skin and seems to smell even more amazing throughout the day which I believe is because of their use of extract based ingredients instead of water. Because it is made from extracts you might want to be careful not to spray it on delicate clothing as the oils might affect that but on regular blends of fabric it is perfectly fine. I like wearing this by itself but you can also layer it with any other  Dedcool scents to create a twist of your own scent. What is so great about this brand is it is genderless, anyone can use it and have the world around them saying you smell so good !

reviews.review_title: LOVE the scent and layering but not the oily cast
reviews.review_text: I really love the scent on this, it is absolutely to die for. On me, it smells both sweet and musky, and li gets throughout the day. I love layering it, especially with Red Dakota and Blonde! My one complaint is that when spraying close to the skin, it leaves an oily cast that doesnu2019t really go away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Usually a subtle or uniquely sweet scents that works with the underlying chemistry of the skin is what I gravitate toward. I have been getting into genderless scent and have been eyeing Dedcool.  I made the mistake of smelling Xtra Milk before trying the original Milk in the discovery kit. While Milk is a great layering scent and the heart of Dedcool...Xtra Milk is so good! Every person that demanded this be brought into fruition I thank you. This was love at first sniff for me and is now my signature scent.  It's so cozy and warm that I could not stop hugging myself haha.I love bergamot but was surprised by how much I loved the amber and white musk that accompanied it. It is such a great musk unique yet genderless and universal. This fragrance is waterless and the longevity was 8 hours sprayed on my skin and lingered way longer on clothes.The bottles simple barcode design is sleek and minimal. My sprayer was more splash than mist but still a 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a perfume lover, I've always wanted to find a wonderful but distinctive scent that would make people associate a certain aroma with me, and therefore I don't like perfumey perfumes that although have a great smile, have no character because everyone wears them.  With DedCool Xtra Milk, I finally obtained my signature scent. If I want something more subtle, not too sweat or floral, I use the product alone, and if I have an event or I want to have a more strong scent, I layer it with other DedCool fragances or even perfumes from other brands, and create something very unique, that smells like me.  I get compliments almost every single time I go out with this on, and even my dog Woody cannot resist! Iu2019ve noticed that when I think itu2019s not there anymore, other people still smell it. It lasts longer on clothes than skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I have never gotten so many compliments on my perfume as I have when I wore this. Xtra milk is amazing on its own. I love that itu2019s pheromone-based so it matches your specific pH level and itu2019s going to be different for every single person that wears it. I also love that the scent develops the longer that you wear it. At first, it has this great gender, neutral, musky smell. After you wear it for an hours or two it developes to your bodies PH, for me I had grapefruit tones, as well as some floral notes. My partner used this, and his tones were more smoky and rich. The scent lasted all day. I love the barcode on this packaging, which just signifies that no one is the same. This perfume is going to add to your original since your original pH and itu2019s unique to you. This is definitely a product that I would recommend to anyone who wants to smell amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool's Xtra Milk fragrance is a captivating journey that transcends traditional scent boundaries. The unique blend of bergamot along with white musks creates an intoxicating aroma that's both comforting and alluring. From the first whiff, it evokes a sense of nostalgia, reminiscent and sun-kissed days. What sets Xtra Milk apart is its ability to adapt to individual skin chemistry, creating a personalized scent experience. The longevity is impressive, with subtle nuances lingering throughout the day. The minimalist packaging complements the fragrance's understated elegance. DedCool has truly crafted a masterpiece with Xtra Milk, making it a versatile and delightful addition to any fragrance collection. This scent has become a signature part of my daily routine, adding a touch of warmth and sophistication to every moment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this brand! Love this scent as well. If you like light clean smells this one is great. It reminds me of Juliette has a gun and even dolce and gabana light blue. This scent is perfect for daytime or celebration. For me, this is going to be my signature scent. I like this brand so much and being vegan, non toxic, genderless; it's the future I support it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a serious fragrance lover and to be honest this one was a little different. Starting with the packaging it was really sleek not too busy, which I loved. I felt that the bottle could have been a little more unique. Maybe a certain shape or something that stands out.  I find that customers are attracted to the packaging first, then the design of the bottle, and lastly the fragrance itself. The fragrance states that it is genderless. However, I feel like it is not really on the feminine side. This fragrance in  particular not the brand overall. The spritzer is really good some actually dart the fragrance out at you staining your clothes but not this one. I would rate the packaging a 7, the bottle itself would get a 2, and the extra milk scent a 5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really thought there would be a more powdery like scent to this, maybe a little bit more of warmer amber but I notice the blend of bergamot and musk makes it a little citrusy metallic on my skin, especially with those being the top 2 notes. With just 2 sprays this one lasted all day long and I was still able to smell it on my clothes so it is definitely u201cextrau201d. My husband really liked the smell of it, and I received extra compliments heu2019s actually going to try it himself so itu2019s great that anyone can wear it! I donu2019t imagine this will become my signature scent but I like it that itu2019s not too strong or over powering where others would be overwhelmed by it, so I will wear it on occasion. And I LOVE that itu2019s non toxic. Aside from the scent, the packaging is super chic and beautiful. I love the glass bottle and unique branding Dedcool has itu2019s really fun, youthful and modern.

reviews.review_title: I didnu2019t expect to love this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a perfume enthusiast with over 10 years under my belt, and going into this I truthfully was not expecting to enjoy this fragrance. I normally donu2019t enjoy very light scents. I lean towards the real heavy hitters, but this fragrance surprised me. It is soft and is very musky and ambery to my nose with a burst of pleasant citrus that I would assume comes from the bergamot note. On my skin this is truly a beautiful my skin but better fragrance, and for being such a soft scent it projects on me surprisingly well! I can smell this on my skin 12 hours after wearing it, although I have to press my nose to my skin to do so. This has quickly became a major love for me, and I never want to have to be without this fragrance ever again! Dedcool has most definitely obtained a repeat customer out of me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally canu2019t tell the difference between DedCoolu2019s Xtra Milk and DedCoolu2019s Milk but I do think Xtra Milk lingers on me a little longer and is better for layering other scents by DedCool. Xtra Milk is exactly like Milku2019s light musk that is the perfect combination of masculine and feminine. Light amber notes in my opinion with more of a bergamot pull. It reminds me of a relaxing spa room. I always get compliments when I wear this perfume, and occasionally my boyfriend will layer it with his cologne. I would recommend this product to others that want to switch it up a little bit or maybe layer on an extra scent without going crazy. DedCoolu2019s Xtra Milk is the perfect subtle perfume that will last a majority of the day and you will receive compliments on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many different scents throughout the years and honestly, I can say that there are only two that have caught my attention enough for me to purchase a full-size bottle. Even then, I wasn't truly satisfied with these scents. They never felt personal nor did they last very long. When I sprayed Dedcool Xtra Milk on myself for the first time I was truly amazed at how beautiful it smells.  Xtra Milk is a beautiful warm, soft, inviting yet soothing scent. The amber, bergamot, and white musk complement each other so well. I don't feel as though one note stands out more than the next. It's not an overwhelming scent, the best way that I can describe it is it's like, my scent but amplified with beautiful fragrance notes. It blends with my body chemistry to create a beautiful scent that I feel is all my own. I can smell it well into the next day as if I just sprayed it so the lasting power is truly amazing. I'm being honest when I say that I'm 100% head over heels in love with Xtra Milk. There's something very intoxicating about it. Maybe it's the warm and cozy feeling it gives me while I'm wearing it? I don't know I just know that my words don't describe how truly beautiful Xtra Milk smells. I have found a scent I can call my own. Thank you Carina for this amazingly beautiful scent!

reviews.review_title: A great scent, though very subtle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried any dedcool perfumes until I tried this one.  As someone who loves trying perfumes, I am very impressed! I love that it is vegan. It is supposed to be a more intense version of their milk perfume, and I do agree that it has more longevity and is stronger than the original. Though it is still a very subtle perfume in my opinion. I would say it is a u201cyour skin but betteru201d type of scent. I personally enjoy those type of perfumes the most. It is very pleasant, with notes of bergamot, white musk, amber. I think the bergamot is the strongest at first application, but with time it diminishes and leaves a yummy cozy scent that I really like! But I think I would have preferred it if the perfume was a slightly bit stronger, as it is very subtle, as I said previously. I think it is a perfect scent for anyone, as it is unisex. It would be great for those who want to have a perfume without it being too strong or overpowering. I have used it for a couple of days, and even thought itu2019s a very light scent, I could still slightly smell it the morning after application, which is nice! I would definitely recommend this perfume

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tested these XTRA MILK for a week now and I must say I really enjoyed its scents. XTRA Milk did an amazing job creating perfume oils and did a huge hit with me. I love the purity of the ingredients and I could wear this scents anytime of the day or night. I used it after I take shower and its fragrance stays for the whole day. It isnu2019t over-powering and it doesnu2019t give me a headache like most perfumes. My daugther who is 5 years old loved its scent also and she always told me that she likes my perfume. I will definitely recommend this Dedcool perfume to all ages especially if you are looking for long lasting scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello! As a beauty enthusiast, I love testing products and giving my honest opinion on how well these beauty items have worked for me. A little bit of background- I am 28 years old and I absolutely love perfumes!! I have heard of dedcool before, but prior to receiving this product I have never tried it before. DedCool Xtra Milk has an as aesthetic packaging with minimalist details like the barcode. It is sleek and unassuming, however, when you try it on, it really is such a unique scent! This has been my go to fragrance and I have smelled my wrist not less than twenty times each time I wear it! The scent lasts throughout the day. I really enjoy the scent- it's a warm musky scent that feels super cozy. I don't have anything like this in my collection, which makes this perfume really special. I look forward to continuing to wear this and checking out other scents from their collections!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of unisex genderless fragrances. After working for many years in the industry, fragrance has skyrocketed and itu2019s great to find a new and refreshing brand. I am a true believer that you get to choose what makes you personally happy in your fragrance choices. This scent is absolutely perfect for those days you want to smell minimal and like your own skin. I personally love the way this scent smells just like skin. Itu2019s natural, soft, and smells clean. Itu2019s the base profile for all of the scents so layering any other Dedcool fragrance is welcomed. I have also tried other brands in a layering effect and this works perfectly as a base to hold scent longer. Many people have commented that I always smell so great. I also appreciate the subtle differences this creates in my personal fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The DedCool Xtra Milk fragrance offers a vegan, water-free formula that emphasizes durability and quality. Its unique scent defies easy description, seamlessly melding with individual skin chemistry to enhance the natural aroma, resulting in a personalized olfactory experience. Xtra Milk simply smells like your skin, but betteru2014an ineffable blend that captivates the senses.  Similar to other DedCool offerings, Xtra Milk maintains a long-lasting presence, with its intimate and skin-close scent profile lingering throughout the day. Its high-quality formulation ensures the fragrance remains true to its essence, delivering a consistent and enchanting aroma.  For me, the scent evokes freshness, clarity, and a mineral-like quality reminiscent of the ocean breeze mingled with sea salt. However, for one of my friends, it opens differently, revealing woody, sweet notes with a bold presence. I advise against blind purchases or relying solely on paper tests in stores. It's crucial to try the fragrance on your skin to fully appreciate its nuances. While there may be a slight oil residue on the skin, I didn't notice this issue on clothes, thanks to the effective spray mechanism.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this fragrance as I love the other dedcool scents. I also love fragrances that are u201cyou but betteru201d and smell natural. This is just that! This is a perfect perfume for days spent inside, running errands, or a casual days! I normally get sensitive to strong smells but am able to wear this and not get headaches! I also love to use this as a layering perfume. Mix and match with other scents to find your perfect scent! So awesome and versatile which is an amazing. I also really like the packaging. The bottle is cute. It is minimalistic and pretty. The box is also gorgeous. I can see this being gifted to anyone! I would definitely recommend this to someone who wants to get into wearing scents or anyone looking for a gift to a friend!

reviews.review_title: I fell in love with Xtra milk
reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the Dedcool Xtra Milk perfume. Here is why I fell in love with this fragrance it took me back to my childhood something nostalgic about it. It's a very familiar smell. In the same sense, it's also unique. It's a milky scent but with a freshness to it. This was a compliment-getter for me. This would be a safe blind buy and easily worn year-round type of fragrance. I believe this would also be good for a man or a woman. From my experience with this fragrance, it was a very positive and easy-to-wear one. Plus this fragrance has no water and it's long-lasting. Get this fragrance you will not be disappointed. This is also a great layering fragrance and you can smell the amber. Also, the bottleis so simple but so cute. This is a must have for any fragrance lover. It has a great sprayer also the perfect amount comes out . My son said he loved my perfume because it smelled good .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Dedcool Extra Milk scent is an amazing perfume that captivates everyone around you. It has notes of bergamot, amber, and vanilla which creates this scent that is warm and familiar. It is also long-lasting and lingered throughout the entire day while consistently smelling good. What sealed the deal for me was how it wasnu2019t too overpowering. Overall, I would definitely recommend this scent for anyone who appreciates a nice alluring fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool Xtra Milk Eau de Perfume smells incredible. This fragrance is fresh, different, vegan, and unisex. I am not typically a huge fan of unisex scents as they tend to favor musky or sweet but this one is special. I am a salon owner and hair professional of over 20 years. I see a lot of fads come and go. Dedcool isn't a fad. It only takes about one spray and the scent not only lasts all day, but improves as your skin warms it. The scent becomes unique to the person who is wearing it. That isn't something you see in most fragrance.  This one has a subtle musk scent that is fresh, clean, and light. It smells like what I imagine a cloud would smell like. I highly recommend Dedcool Xtra Milk to everyone. It smells so great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: DedCool Xtra Milk is a delight! Exuding a warm and inviting scent with a strong presence of Amber notes. During a visit to my parents the fragrance garnered compliments from both of them, highlighting its appeal across genders. I appreciate its genderless packaging, reflecting Dedcool's inclusive beliefs. As a clean and vegan brand it aligns with my values, ensuring a guilt free indulgence in its alluring aroma! The scent lingers on the skin for about 3-4 hours and leaves a lasting impression on clothing for up to 5 hours. Its captivating aroma remains inviting throughout the wear, though a re-spray may be needed to maintain its intensity after a while. I wholeheartedly encourage you to give it a try and experience it's delightful scent first hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I must admit, I never was a huge fan of perfumes before but recently Iu2019ve started to dabble a bit more. When I tell you this scent stopped me dead in my tracks and soared to the top spot being my new favorite scent. I am completely obsessed. I have someone new every day asking me what Iu2019m wearing and where to get it. The bergamot and white musk is so subtle yet classy and sexy. The amber is seductive yet flirty and fun. I have no bad things to say at all because there is nothing bad about this product. The smell of soft and warm and inviting in the best way. I would swim in it if I could. I love this brand and everything they stand for and this is by far the best scent. If youu2019re going to buy one buy this one. I guarantee youu2019ll be a repeat customer. Spray it on as much as you like and be ready to turn heads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dedcool's Xtra milk is a fantastic blend of cleanly sourced Bergamot, white musk, and amber. It was a subtle scent reminiscent of my younger days when I would have tea with my grandmother. It was a ritual for us every Saturday morning. Why did this perfume remind me of those lazy Saturday mornings? Because our tea of choice was always lady grey, which prominently features bergamot, the top note I took from this lovely scent. A wonderful memory. I miss those days very much.  While the scent is subtle I did receive many compliments while wearing it, my husband was a huge fan and picked up on the fact I was wearing a new scent almost immediately. He asked me what I was wearing and asked me to wear it again the following day which was a win in my book. I wore it alone the first day and layered it with a favorite scent the next day and found it pairs well with other scents. It works as a compliment very nicely. I paired it with a vanilla-heavy scent and found the combination very intoxicating.  The scent when worn alone lasted a good length of time, fading through the day and I would say that it lasted for about six hours without reapplication.  I enjoy Dedcool's passion for sustainable practices as well, with their focus on clean production and lessening their carbon footprint. It makes me feel better about using their products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 33 year old that likes to keep things simple and typically enjoys gourmand scents, I was surprised at how much I enjoyed the DedCool Xtra Milk. This scent is amazing. I only use two spritzes (one on my wrist and one in my hair) and the scent lasts all day without having to reapply. With other scents I find that I am having to reapply throughout the day to still smell them. The bottle is absolutely my style, so simple yet so chic. I think this fragrance is good for every day use as it isnu2019t overpowering but also great for special occasions. The pump dispenses the perfect amount of scent and is easy to use. I love how fresh yet elegant this scent profile is. I would recommend Xtra Milk to just about any age group because it is not overwhelming. I am excited to continue using this daily to stay fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love fresh linen hanging from the clotheslineu2014there are phases of different scents derived from the detergent and softener, that mingle over time with the breeze and breath of nature. The Dedcool Xrta Milk Eau De Parfum embodies that experience; when initally applied, there is a striking fresh, cotton-like white musk mingled with zesty undertones of the bergamot; as it dries, the scent warms to a more subtle, spicy amber with pervasive fresh musk and a hint of bergamot. The amazing thing about this fragrance line is that it doesnu2019t dry the skin; rather, there is a silky, luxurious feel to the skin that makes on obliged to massage it over the neck and shoulders (such as I did). It smells like the romance of the ocean and the salty, back breeze. It lasts all day, and into the next! I highly, highly recommend this wonderful fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, lemme just say DedCool Xtra Milk is my new go-to! As a college girl who's into unique scents, this perfume checks all the boxes. The musk is so fresh and chill - reminds me of warm laundry or snuggling into a cozy sweatshirt. It starts out light then builds with pretty amber and bergamot notes. Smells so comforting yet still totally modern. What's awesome is it really does adapt to your scent. After wearing for a bit, it's like I can't tell where my natural smell ends and the perfume begins. Feels like I'm smelling an enhanced version of my personal scent. Pretty cool effect! I love that it's genderless too. This isn't heavy or too sweet/spicy. It's just soft, creamy, a lil' sweet. Works for any mood or outfit. The bottle looks sleek on my dresser. An all around win in my book! Can't wait to spritz this on the daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Clean girl aesthetic? Nay! Clean girl fragrance, clean girl essence, clean girl lifestyle. This fragrance became a part of me. No I mean literally I wonu2019t be without it now. It is a close to the skin fragrance that feels cozy and personal. Itu2019s the best thing if you love dove soap, laundry detergent, hair products, CLEAN smell. It plays well with others too, I've layered Xtra Milk with other DedCools and itu2019s CleanCool I love her and the comfort she brings. To me she is she but I do believe she is unisex in the sense that everyone could use this scent. I wish my dog could wear this scent thatu2019s how much I love it. I love that it is vegan and cruelty free also, I havenu2019t had a headache or allergic reaction which is important for me! Will buy this til Iu2019m Ded ud83eudef6.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra Milk is sophisticated smoked musky with hints of freshness from bergamot note. It brings me a relaxing vibe like lying on the bed on lazy Sunday morning with the fresh smell of clean sheets around my nose. If Milk is creamy, soft musky with slightly sweet, Xtra Milk is sharper  musky, like cozy cashmere with citrusy freshness. Itu2019s definitely a unisex scent. Even my husband said I smelled good when I first tried the scent out before going to work. However, it doesnu2019t last long on me unfortunately. It stayed on me as skin scent around 2-3 hours then disappeared. Reapplying multiple time throughout the day is a must. Even though Xtra Milk has not good longevity to stand by itself, it will be a great scent for layering as a good base scent. I paired it with some of floral perfume oil bottles that Iu2019m having. It gave a good depth of smoke musky layer into the scent in general. I liked it a lot. I think it can be versatile layering scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hi, Iu2019m Leslye and Iu2019m a Beauty Enthusiast!  The DedCool Fragrance brand is completely new to me. Iu2019m thrilled to have gotten the chance to try the Xtra Milk fragrance. This aroma is very clean, very light, warm and unique. This genderless fragrance doesnu2019t give feminine or masculine, but a neutral scent.  When opening the box and getting the first sniff, I worried because it did not smell like anything. Once sprayed on the body, it felt like the scent grew. As I went about my day I would catch the aroma, almost like a reminder that itu2019s on me. I can confirm the scent lasted all day, and lingered even the next morning.  DedCool Xtra Milk has now become a favorite, not just for the amazing scent, the bottle itself is clean, minimal, elegant. I love to share new finds with friends and family but I might just keep this one to myself. Hehe

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this if you like Juliette has a gun youu2019ll like this. Its very light clean smell and the bottle is cute and different. It doesnu2019t last long though? I already got a compliment on it. I think it goes along what your skin ph is. Itu2019s genderless so both can wear it

reviews.review_title: For those who enjoy light scents.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For the most part, I enjoy this perfume. This one is for amber lovers, as I find it to be the dominant note here. I do find it to be great for everyday use. The scent is slightly warm but still pretty neutral and sophisticated. It isn't unique, but I'm pretty happy with how it smells. The projection and longevity are just okay, but that's what I've come to expect from clean fragrances. I absolutely adore this perfume though! The amber scent is the star of the show and is perfect for anyone who loves this note. It is a versatile fragrance that is perfect for everyday use. The scent is warm and inviting, yet sophisticated and neutral enough to wear to work or any formal occasion. While it may not be the most unique fragrance out there, it still smells amazing and will leave you feeling confident and empowered. The projection and longevity of this fragrance are decent, but not exceptional. However, this is typical of most clean fragrances, so it's not necessarily a negative. What I really love about this perfume is that it is not overpowering, but still noticeable enough to make an impact. Overall, I think this fragrance is a great purchase. While I might not personally purchase it, I definitely don't regret getting to try this perfume either. It's the perfect fragrance for anyone looking for a warm, inviting and slightly exotic scent that is both versatile and sophisticated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ded Cool Xtra Milk is so unique and classy. The musk truly makes you feel comfortable, and confident. The packaging for this parfume is very unique also. I've never seen a bottle like this. I love how simple and unique it is. If you are looking for a unique, comforting, elegant scent that last all day, this is the scent for you. The scent lasted all day, and even after I showered I could still smell it. I received so many compliments. Everyone wanted to know what I was wearing! And the best part is it's genderless. Anyone can wear it!! I think the price point for this parfume is perfect. You can get two different sizes, which is nice. I can have one for home, and for my purse or car, how perfect. I would Definitely recommend this parfume!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been getting more interested in fragrance, and this was the perfect perfume for me to try. It's a perfect skin scent that got me instant compliments from both genders the first day it arrived. The perfume is oil-based, so it had to dry down a little longer than a water-based perfume would. The scent is very clean and fresh, with the tiniest hint of vanilla. It also has a musk, that makes it very obvious it's unisex, if that makes sense. Not a strong musk, but a nice, refreshing, and slight, musk. Now, it's very easy to go nose-blind to this scent, and very quickly! I stopped smelling this perfume on me after 30 minutes, but my parents still gave me compliments when they got home from work. They actually smelled it right after they walked into the living room, and I was in the kitchen. You might stop smelling it, but other people definitely won't. If you like light and airy scents, this is right up your alley!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so thrilled to try out Dedcool Xtra Milk Fragrance after hearing about the brand. Itu2019s such an interesting concept in that you can wear it by itself or layered with other fragrances. I have tried it both ways and honestly donu2019t know which I prefer. When wearing it alone, it has a very gender neutral smell. I liked it on both myself and my male partner. Iu2019d describe it as warm and spicy but subtle, like itu2019s a very discreet scent, but you definitely smell better than if you didnu2019t have anything on. I think I heard it described as, u201cSmells like you, but better,u201d and I would have to agree. When paired with another fragrance, it adds a warm, musky layer. It was interesting to put it on top on perfumes I already love. The result was something original and new but still smelling great. Of other Dedcool scents, I highly recommend pairing it with Taunt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coming from someone with a vast amount of perfume and body mists and body oils from roll ons to sprays to solids, I must say Dedcool is one of the most unique ones yet.   To start the packaging is very nice and minimalist, it can be set out or displayed in my room very nicely without overpowering decor wise or looking strange, it is very aesthetically appealing and gives off a rather mature feel.  When it comes to the smell part of this product, it is extremely long lasting and lasted an entire 8 hour school day for me whereas with other mists I usually am reapplying. Its a clean scent that stays and gives off a warm or soft vibe just as the packaging says.  This product is definitely a 5 star product for me and I convinced family members to buy it as well, super fitting for formal events as well as perfect for layering for everyday wear, you cant go wrong with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m going to be honest and put it out there that I didnu2019t know layering perfume was a thing. I know youu2019re thinking u201cWhat?! How?!u201d  Iu2019ve just never heard of it.  But, Iu2019m so glad I was introduced to the world of layering and the fabulous scent of Dedcoolu2019s Xtra Milk.   A perfect mix of fresh and musk.  Itu2019s definitely a stand out fragrance. But, not in an overwhelming way.  Itu2019s perfect to wear alone or add it to another fragrance.  Iu2019ve been obsessed with Xtra Milk since the day I got it.  Iu2019ve layered it with 5 of Dedcoolu2019s other scents and a few others I had laying around. Every single one of them blended with Milk beautifully!   I would absolutely recommend everyone to add this to your perfume stash! You wonu2019t regret it!   The possibilities are endless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Xtra milk by Dedcool is the perfect clean scent! It smells amazing on its own and layers with almost every scent profile. On its own, the scent reminds me of a breezy warm spring day. I enjoy that it isnu2019t too strong and the fact that itu2019s genderless. I spray this on me and my boyfriend before going out and it fills the whole car with a warm light scent that lasts all night. Xtra milk also smells divine layered on top of a vanilla lotion for a subtle warmth and dimension added. This scent also reminds me of clean laundry fresh out of the dryer. This scent is so universal it can be used year round. I would recommend this to anyone no matter the age. Iu2019m usually more drawn to gourmand fragrances or super sweet ones so Iu2019m suprised by how much I enjoyed this. I will be repurchasing once my bottle runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Letu2019s start with the packaging. The Dedcool perfume in xtra milk comes in a sleek, minimalist bottle that exudes a sense of understated elegance. The frosted glass bottle feels luxurious in the hand, and the simple black cap adds a touch of sophistication. I appreciate the brandu2019s commitment to sustainability, and the fact that the bottle is recyclable is a definite plus.  Now, onto the fragrance itself. The Dedcool perfume in xtra milk is a delightful blend of amber, bergamot, and white musk. Upon first application, I was immediately struck by the warm and inviting aroma. The bergamot provides a fresh and citrusy top note, which is complemented by the rich and earthy aroma of amber. The white musk adds a soft and sensual undertone, making this fragrance perfect for both day and night wear. Overall, the scent is beautifully balanced and incredibly inviting.  However, my enthusiasm was dampened by the perfumeu2019s lack of longevity. Despite applying it to my pulse points as recommended, I found that the scent disappeared within an hour. This was incredibly disappointing, as the initial fragrance was so promising. I would have loved for the scent to last longer, as it was truly delightful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I absolutely love this perfume! The fact that itu2019s genderless is perfect for me. Iu2019m a woman who is more drawn to cologne type scents but obviously donu2019t want to smell like a man. This is the perfect natural scent that really works off each individuals body to create a unique scent. I got lots of compliments the first time I wore it and because it doesnu2019t contain water, the scent is strong (but not overwhelming) and it lasts a long time. I even noticed my bedroom smells like it days after applying which is a pleasant surprise. Another cool thing about the xtra milk, is that you can layer it with other scents and it just enhances it and doesnu2019t overpower the other scent, it just blends to create a scent 2.0. This will be my new go to perfume for special occasions and everyday wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is very particular it has a very light scent it smells clean and sweet at the same time I can't quite explain it. You can definitely smell the white musk and the bergamot more than the amber. I think the bergamot is what makes it smell clean and the white musk and Amber give it sort of a sweet scent. This is also one of those fragrances that activate with your pH because is genderless it's going to smell very different on every person. This is definitely a fragrance for everyday use you might not notice it when you spray it on but other people will notice. I couldn't smell it on me but my husband and my son immediately notice and they say it smells really nice. This is one of those perfumes that I can definitely use even if I'm just around the house doing housework or whatever because it makes me feel clean. It has that soft clean sweet scent for all occasions. This definitely an everyday fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a licensed Esthetician for over four years and a Registered Nurse for over 30 years and am always looking for products and cosmetics to improve my personal appearance as well as my skin health. My appearance is very important to me as far as my clients first impression.  I try all products on myself before I recommend to my clients based on skin type so I know how it looks feels and smells. DedCool Xtra Milk is a very unique amazing fragrance.  It is a much lighter scent than other DedCool fragrances that I have tried.  From the first time that I put it on I got numerous compliments on how good I smelled.  It is a light clean scent with a hint of citrus that will smell a little different on everyone and it can be layered and layered with other DedCool fragrances, I have mixed it with DedCool Sunlit Blooms for a mor floral fragrance.  The Xtra Milk is so versatile and I would recommend it to all clients, men and women.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this perfume. The combination of key notes are truly unique and captivating scent that is suitable for anyone, regardless of gender. The bergamot provides a refreshing and citrusy top note that instantly uplifts my mood. It's a perfect balance of brightness and warmth. The white musk adds a clean and soft element to the perfume, creating a subtle yet alluring base note. The amber brings a rich and sensual depth to the fragrance, making it incredibly sophisticated and long-lasting. What I appreciate most about this perfume is its versatility. It's perfect for any occasion, whether it's a casual day out or a special evening event. The scent is not overpowering, but it definitely leaves a lasting impression. This is a truly captivating scent that is perfect for anyone who appreciates a unique and elegant fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a perfume girly and always go to Sephora to find a scent I can call my own and I think Iu2019ve finally found it! Dedcool has always been a brand Iu2019ve kept tabs on. Last year I blindly bought TAUNT and I loved it. It smells like a grown up fruity pebbles mixed with your scent but better. I finally got my hands on the Xtra Milk and omg itu2019s beautiful and even stronger than the original Milk scent which personally, I couldnu2019t smell on myself. Xtra Milk smells like me in the best way possible. Itu2019s verrry similar to Nematu2019s amber perfume oil. If you love amber, bergamot, and musk then this is definitely for you. I get sooo many compliments when I wear this from complete strangers. Itu2019s the type of scent where your nose adjusts to it and you forget you sprayed it on but everyone around you seems to notice. Itu2019s so elegant and classy yet not overpowering in any way. You can wear this after an everything shower and it blends in with your skin chemistry to create such a unique scent but familiar in such a cozy way. Iu2019ll also mention that I frequently get headaches and nauseated with many perfumes but this has never given me any problems. I will repurchase over and over again and can finally say that Iu2019ve found my signature scent. 10/10 all around for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect minimal gender neutral scent. It has notes of amber, bergamot, and white musk. The original milk had those same notes but it was creamy, soft, ethereal, and luminescent like the ghost of a fragrance. Xtra milk I feel brought in more of a physical element to the scent, the white musk was slightly stronger. It felt simple and sophisticated I can see this being good on anyone itu2019s very enhancing and can be a good base for your other fragrances. I personally love this as a room spray or something to spray my clothes with. This is what I want my loved ones to smell when walking into my home something warm clean and welcoming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As beauty influencer, brand ambassador, beauty content creator, makeup and beauty product seller, and as a person who has knowledge and experience in cosmetics, beauty products, makeup, and fitness; I love Ded Cool Xtra Milk. The scent of this perfume is very clean, simple, refreshing, and unique. Itu2019s also genderless. All genders can wear it. Ded Cool Xtra Milk definitely stands out from other perfumes. I love the unique and beautiful scent of this perfume. I apply this perfume behind my ears and on my wrist. This perfume lasts all day long, and it doesnu2019t go away quickly. This odor also boosts my mood, and it boosts my self confidence. When I use this perfume, I feel alluring attractiveness. I love the cute and the pure bottle of Ded Cool Xtra Milk. I also love the box of this perfume. The bottle is very clean and easy to use. I also love the size of the perfume because itu2019s not too big and not too small. I love the fact that the bottle is made from pure, thin glass like most perfume bottles. However, if the bottle falls, it will instantly break. Overall, amazing perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new Dedcool Xtra Milk fragrance. I like that it comes in the signature simple but elegant bottle with the barcode just like the other Dedcool fragrances. This fragrance is genderless, and I definitely can see both men and women wear this fragrance as it has more of a spicy amber and deeper smelling musk notes in it. I like how this fragrance with the notes of amber, bergamot and white musk evolves during the day when wearing it. It starts a bit light and clean with the amber when just sprayed onto the skin but then the warmth and spiciness of the bergamot and white musk combine and round out this fragrance to a soft and subtle warm scent. The notes never get too overpowering but stay noticeable during the day. It is a long-lasting fragrance and such a beautiful addition to the Dedcool collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh, how I absolutely love this fragrance! This has quickly become my favorite scent to wear. It is warm and yet light all at the same time. This is one of those fragrances that you wear and people think you just smell like the cleanest person around. It doesn't give off perfume vibes. The Amber makes this so beautiful. It smells like comfort in a bottle. I have been wearing this alone during the day and layering this at night for a deeper scent. This scent lasts all day on me. I would say this is one of the longest lasting scents I have tried. I am very prone to migraines and this scent doesn't bother them at all. The lightness helps with that. I would say this would be a very safe blind buy if you like scents that are undetectable, but so sexy at the same time.
